Job Summary, , The Red Hat Sales team is looking for an Inside Sales Representative to join us in Amsterdam, Netherlands In this role, you will work with experienced field sales account managers and a regional SAP business development manager to enable sales growth for new customers in the SAP market You will generate qualified leads for the sales account managers, help build pipeline, identify customer issues, gather their technology data, build attendance to marketing events, and allow the field sales account managers to focus on closing business Youll be responsible for outbound prospecting and will be measured by how effectively you move leads into appointments and the pipeline You will be tasked with meeting the demands of a new kind of buyer, who primarily lives online, behind the telephone, and is difficult to get to These buyers form opinions before speaking to vendors based on the information they uncover online, through crowdsourcing, or referrals Youll have to develop a deep understanding of their challenges and business in order to get their attention As an Inside Sales Representative, youll be an integral part of the sales team and our lead on the account Youll need to think and react quickly, as well as excel in having online conversations In addition, you should be a great content finder with a positive attitude and an ability to get attention and handle difficult interactions with ease, , , , , , , , , , Red Hat is the worlds leading provider of enterprise open source software solutions, using a communitypowered approach to deliver reliable and highperforming Linux, hybrid cloud, container, and Kubernetes technologies Red Hat helps customers integrate new and existing IT applications, develop cloudnative applications, standardize on our industryleading operating system, and automate, secure, and manage complex environments Awardwinning support, training, and consulting services make Red Hat a trusted adviser to the Fortune 500 As a strategic partner to cloud providers, system integrators, application vendors, customers, and open source communities, Red Hat can help organizations prepare for the digital future, , Red Hat is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and an affirmative action employer We review applications for employment without regard to their race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, ancestry, citizenship, age, veteran status, genetic information, physical or mental disability, medical condition, marital status, or any other basis prohibited by law, , Red Hat does not seek or accept unsolicited resumes or CVs from recruitment agencies We are not responsible for, and will not pay, any fees, commissions, or any other payment related to unsolicited resumes or CVs foundation of challenging and disrupting the way things are done, and were looking for innovators who are as committed to shaping the future of cybersecurity as we are, , , , , , As part of our sales with a job in sales Becoming a part of the team means you will be surrounded by amazing, smart and hardworking, teammates and thats a great place to be Plus, the added bonus of changing the world Now thats just icing on the cake, , , , , , , , , , Additional Information, , , , Our sales team members work handinhand with large organizations around the world to keep their digital environments complex cyberthreats, , , , Were trailblazers that dream big, take risks, and challenge cybersecuritys status quo Its simple we cant accomplish our mission without diverse teams innovating, together Castors SaaS products already power 4,000 clinical trials across 90 countries and, having just secured a 12 million Series A investment, were looking for purpose driven Account Executives to enhance our journey as we bring clinical research into the 21st century Want to know more about the day in the life of a Sales Account Executive Read this blog from one of our team, , , , Castor is a leading cloudbased clinical data platform working with some of the worlds largest medical device companies, biopharmas and renowned academic institutes, , We simplify the clinical trial process, from recruitment to analysis, with userfriendly, patient centric technology Our mission is to bring medical research into the digital age Why Because medical research is still largely run using freetext, paper and legacy technology, , Our selfservice platform enables our users to run remote, device enabled, patient centric trials By helping our users capture high quality data and making it machine readable, we are fundamentally changing the flawed evidencebased medicine process, , , , Our global sales team works across Europe and the US Built out with Business Development Reps, Account Executives, Business Development Managers and Sales Operations support, the teams commitment is to partner with new clients and develop commercial accounts across the clinical research industry eg with CROs, pharma, biotech and medical device companies The end result Bringing clinical trials to the 21st century, , , , Whats your mission To sell the top rated electronic data capture EDC platform How Through qualifying inbound leads and proactive prospecting Through taking conversations from start to close, including conducting product demos, youll become a Castor expert What comes next Youll manage your newly generated accounts, maximizing annual revenue and the impact of clinical research, , , , , Being passionate about and engaging with our purpose of faster, smarter medical research, youll bring a resultsoriented and proactive sales spirit Using knowledge of selling complex, B2B, SaaS solutions, youll have the selfawareness, expert listening skills and commercial confidence to create unique solutions which solve customers needs, , , , , Its a crucial time for Castor Were on full power mode and scalingup at an exponential rate For you, the opportunities are endless, , , , , At Castor we truly live and breathe our core values, believing we can achieve anything with a healthy and happy team With this in mind, we offer the following benefits, , , , , Want to know more Check out the role profile for some further insights or apply now

About The Team, , The Sales Development Representative team is a critical component of our gotomarket pipeline strategy and presents an outstanding opportunity to learn fundamental sales skills in preparation for an exciting career in software sales We work extremely hard, but also prioritize our fun, collaborative and wellbalanced culture As a rapidly growing company, opportunities for internal growth and career development are plentiful, , , , The Sales Development Representative is an ambitious and organized professional who loves working with prospective customers and bringing in sales leads SDRs play a critical role in the sales cycle and are often the first contact that a prospective customer has with Miro Whether interacting on the phone, through email, or some other medium, SDRs make a positive impression of Miro by being responsible for the first portion of a prospects sales journey Our goal is to create great customer experiences by being Miro product experts and consulting with customers to identify their needs and pain points, , , , , , , , , , , , , Miro is an online collaborative whiteboard platform that enables distributed teams to work effectively together, from running brainstorming sessions and workshops to planning projects, from designing new products and services to facilitating agile ceremonies With over 10 million users, Miro is trusted by Dell, Cisco, Salesforce, PWC, EY, Deloitte and many more global companies of all sizes, , At Miro, we are a team of dreamers We look for individuals who dream big, work hard and above all stay humble Collaboration is at the heart of what we do and through our work together we hope to create a supportive, welcoming, and innovative environment We strive to play as a team to win the world and create a better version of ourselves everyday If this sounds like something that excites you, we want to hear from you, , Check out our career page for all our open roles or hop onto this Miro board to learn more about us

Our Sales team at SES The satellite telecommunication market is living in an age of great technology disruption very high throughput satellites, NGSOs etc and new key markets including aviation both civil and government, cruise and universal broadband represent an enormous growth opportunity for SES This is where we want the new SES sales talent to be The SES sales team develops and maintains customer intimacy as well as strong and longstanding customer relationships The sales team works to find and adopt new business models, forge new business ventures with customer partners and ultimately drive multifunctional internal teams to make the deal happen The essence of the SES sales DNA is do what it takes, until its done Are you, Want to become an SESer Then read the full job description to find out more, , As a member of the Sales Associate Program you will perform three sixmonths rotations in one of our main offices Washington, Betzdorf, The Hague or Singapore in areas like sales engineering, fleet and or asset management, commercial operations and sales by shadowing one of our sales leaders You will go through an extensive learning and development curriculum including both internal and external trainings and get comfortable with, At the end of the 18 months program you are expected to become an effective salesperson ready to join the SES sales team and negotiate multimilliondollar deals contributing to the growth of SES, , Were looking for brilliant and resilient individuals with an inspiring and rich life story and a strong interest in sales and negotiation The candidates must be very motivated to perform the Sales Associate Program at the highest standard of excellence to then become part of the SESs sales force Given the nature of the role we feel its important for you to understand your own added value and make yourself heard All this is making us actively search for the following

Sales Accountmanager full time, , Purewhite is een Amsterdams modemerk opgericht in 2008 door drie jonge ondernemers Het logo van het merk, een driehoek, symboliseert een drieeenheid en diepe vriendschap van deze mannen Het merk is oorspronkelijk begonnen met het produceren van witte overhemden voor mannen en is uitgegroeid tot een modemerk met een uitgebreide denimcollectie en accessoires Purewhite biedt de moderne man betaalbare en tijdloze ontwerpen voor elk seizoen, De functie, Wij zijn op zoek naar een enthousiaste, ervaren Accountmanager met een breed netwerk en een passie voor mode die graag rondreist om klanten door heel Nederland te ontmoeten en onze collecties bij nieuwe klanten in de winkels te krijgen De verkoopafspraken kunnen ook plaatsvinden in onze showroom in Amsterdam Klanten zijn voor jou het allerbelangrijkste, je bent in staat om hen centraal te stellen en mee te denken in hun behoeften Ondertussen ben je altijd alert op nieuwe kansen en mogelijkheden die zich voordoen bij nieuwe klanten Jij durft het gesprek aan te gaan, te adviseren en nee te zeggen wanneer nodig, Hiernaast zorg je voor de salesrapportages zodat je de analyse van de verkoopcijfers kan doen en kansen voor replenishment kan maximaliseren, groeistrategien kan identificeren binnen de huidige accounts, voorraadbeheer en orderadministratie Omzetverhogen en marge verbeteren is je grootste doel, dat spreekt natuurlijk voor zich, Past deze baan bij jou, , , Wat kun je van ons verwachten, , , Enthousiast geworden, Wil jij voor een snelgroeiend Nederlands merk werken en samen met een team van enthousiaste collegas Purewhite naar een next level brengen Stuur je CV en motivatiebrief via de onderstaande button

De Job, De Category Manager is onderdeel van het Trade Marketing team, dat verantwoordelijk is voor het analyseren, uitdenken en implementeren van futureproof categorieprojecten Door het ontwikkelen van klantgerichte oplossingen en baanbrekende activaties is Red Bull al jarenlang een zeer belangrijke groeipijler binnen de categorie fris En dat houden we graag zo, Strategie, Je bent verantwoordelijk voor de ontwikkeling van een multichannel strategie en definieert daarbinnen de rol van Red Bull voor ieder kanaal RetailOutofHome Hierbij bestaan geen heilige huisjes en sta jij aan het roer van de groeiplannen voor aankomende jaren Op basis van zowel kwalitatieve als kwantitatieve data bepaal jij de categorievisie op frisdranken inclusief relevant assortiment en bijbehorend schappenplan Hierbij maak je onderscheid tussen de verschillende shopping missions om in iedere trip zo optimaal mogelijk te kunnen converteren De voorsprong die we hebben als King of Convenience weet jij verder uit te bouwen door middel van optimale beschikbaarheid, zichtbaarheid en invulling van de 4Ps onder alle omstandigheden, Analyse en planning, Turning data into insights is niet voldoende binnen Red Bull Turning data into store is meer our cup of tea Je laat geen kans onbenut om de door jou verkregen inzichten op een creatieve manier door te vertalen richting winkelvloer Hiervoor zijn we op zoek naar een ondernemende en overtuigende collega die op basis van intensieve samenwerking en Test, Learn en Improve naar optimale conversie streeft voor zowel de categorie als Red Bull Daarnaast ben jij als dataexpert uiteraard in staat om gedegen analyses te maken waardoor we onze groei nog beter kunnen monitoren, Number one, In vijf jaar tijd is het segment energiedranken van plaats 6 naar plaats 2 opgeklommen binnen de categorie Frisdranken Het unieke hierbij is dat de promodruk nagenoeg gelijk gebleven is De sterke basegroei die het segment doormaakt, is een natuurlijk gevolg van onze sterke focus en aanwezigheid op de winkelvloer shoppers komen in contact met het blikje daar waar zij het verwachten Jij zorgt ervoor, samen met Marketing en Sales, dat we deze unieke instore positie de komende vijf jaar verder verankeren binnen een snel veranderend retaillandschap  , Stakeholdermanagement, Making the impossible possible daar is het bedrijf groot mee geworden Binnen Red Bull winnen we als team, maar verwachten we dat jij je rol hierin pakt Als zeer ervaren Category manager weet jij de verantwoordelijkheden en prioriteiten van jou en je team perfect neer te zetten in de organisatie, tot aan HQ Middels uitstekende sociale en communicatieve vaardigheden laat je je team crossfunctioneel excelleren en zorg je ervoor dat de gedefinieerde doelen behaald worden, zowel intern als extern, People development, Red Bull is meer dan een blikje binnen Red Bull geven we vleugels aan mensen en ideen We onderscheiden ons door onze evenementen, partnerships en grote mediaproducties Sinds de start van het bedrijf in 1997 heeft een ondernemende spirit ons geleid bij alles wat we hebben bereikt Meaning, FreedomResponsibility en Mastery zijn de 3 pijlers waarop iedereen binnen de organisatie bouwt en excelleert In deze functie geef je leiding aan twee ervaren Category Managers Je draagt zorg voor hun persoonlijke en professionele ontwikkeling en haalt middels coaching het beste uit hun naar boven

About Sustainalytics, , Sustainalytics has been a leading independent provider of Environmental, Social and Governance ESG research for the last 25 years Our insights are used by clients to make better informed investment decisions, engage with companies in relation to their business activities and drive change, , Sustainalytics is a growing organization with 700 employees and 17 offices globally We have a flexible and supportive working culture and empower our employees to progress and develop quickly in an entrepreneurial environment, , For more information, visit wwwsustainalyticscom, , Under COVID19 circumstances, all Sustainalytics employees are now working from home More than ever, ESG factors are critical to building a more ethical and sustainable global economy Our teams need passionate colleagues to join us in delivering quality research products to our clients worldwide, , Our recruitment and selection process is continuing via phone or video meetings New team members are onboarded and start their first day with the company from the safety of their homes, , We rely on virtual team meetings and management practices, as well as a remote buddy program, to support a smooth integration in our virtual offices, , , , Sustainable Finance Solutions SFS is new and rapid growth business within Sustainalytics that is responsible for developing and bringing Impact and ESG solutions to the sellside of the financial market, , Our services include reviews of sustainable financial instruments, such as green bonds and providing other sustainability rating services, such as helping banks to develop more sustainable loan portfolios and green products for their clients, , This is a rapid growth business, in a fastexpanding green finance market, so our team has to build while flying and adapt to high demands and changes, in our pursuit of supporting financial actors who are making the world more sustainable and equitable through how they use their capital, , , , This is an exciting opportunity for a salesperson to lead the commercial development for Sustainalytics in sales of ESG services to large companies, , In this role you will do business development, prospect, and turn qualified opportunities into sales of ESG and sustainability to Europes leading companies, , You will also gain profile within the ESG market through speaking opportunities, networking, and engagement in market development The ideal candidate has interest and experience in both financial services and sustainability, , , , , , , The ideal candidate will be a genuine team player who can reach objectives individually, as well as through close collaboration and coordination with other team members, based on Sustainalytics relationshipfocused consultative sales philosophy The candidate should have the following qualifications, , , , , In keeping with our ongoing efforts to represent the diversity of our community, we strongly encourage people from diverse groups to apply Sustainalytics is committed to providing accommodations for individuals with disabilities, upon request, , Sustainalytics thanks all applicants for their interest, however only those applicants requested to participate in the interview process will be contacted, , Your privacy while being in contact with Sustainalytics is one of our fundamental commitments here Review our Privacy Policy to find out more about how we handle the personal data you provide us during the recruitment process

right opportunities at the right time Having the ability to forecast effectively is something you will be good at too, , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , Please check out our website to review our Auto req ID 221059BR, , Job Description, , What does the internship involve, , PepsiCo is looking for an analytic, independent and ambitious intern to support our retail sales team in the Netherlands for 6 months as of February 2021, , Within the retail sales department we are working daily on forging and strengthening collaborative partnerships with 3 different customer buying groups Albert Heijn, Jumbo and Superunie, which represent 15 retailers in the Netherlands For each buying group we have sales managers, account managers, account supports and commercial finance managers within the team Together with other departments such as category management, marketing, ecommerce, revenue management, logistics the team works on developing and executing customercentric sales plans on assortment, promotion and activation to grow our business, , As retail sales intern you will support the team in the development and rollout of our retail sales plans at all 3 buying groups A crucial part of your support is analyzing the customer data through SiS AH, 7even Jumbo and Nielsen all customers to track our performance and gain relevant insights on the impact of the initiatives we play Based on these insights we will review and adapt our plans accordingly Your customer data analysis input will be essential in the creation and tracking of the yearly customer plans Besides analyses, you will contribute to implementing tailor made activations both instore and on ecommerce, performing physical store checks to spot new innovations, trends  opportunities at our retailers, and supporting the team in multidisciplinary projects for which connecting with other departments is key, , All in all this internship is offering you a broad customer experience in the Dutch retailer landscape It also provides an international touch, as Albert Heijn and Jumbo have stores in Belgium as well, and these marketplace dynamics are very different from the Netherlands It will involve a wide set of tasks to develop your professional skills in a commercial company and can be your first step towards a career in sales, , , , At PepsiCo, we are not only proud of our market leading brands, but also attach great value to growth opportunities and personal development Next to working with inspirational and creative colleagues, we offer sufficient training opportunities to give our professionals the opportunity to achieve great results At PepsiCo we foster an informal working atmosphere and value everyones input and ideas No day is ever the same and you will constantly be challenged to bring out your best PepsiCo was rewarded this year once again with the Top Employer Nederland and Top Employer Europe certification, , In addition to your rewarding job function, we offer excellent working conditions that go hand in hand For example, you get remunerated for your role as an intern, get to take home goodies from the company every Friday and are given multiple chances to connect with the other interns 1015, to name a few, , , , PepsiCo products are enjoyed by consumers more than one billion times a day in more than 200 countries and territories around the world PepsiCo generated more than 67 billion in net revenue in 2019, driven by a complementary food and beverage portfolio that includes FritoLay, Gatorade, PepsiCola, Quaker and Tropicana PepsiCos product portfolio includes a wide range of enjoyable foods and beverages, including 23 brands that generate more than 1 billion each in estimated annual retail sales, , Guiding PepsiCo is our vision to Be the Global Leader in Convenient Foods and Beverages by Winning with Purpose Winning with Purpose reflects our ambition to win sustainably in the marketplace and embed purpose into all aspects of the business For more information, visit wwwpepsicocom, , , , Upload your CV and cover letter If your profile fits to the role and to PepsiCo, we will invite you for a video interview For questions regarding this internship vacancy, please contact Elena Wathelet ElenaWatheletpepsicocom, , , , , , , , , , , , Not Eligible for Relocation

Job Description: SALES INTERN, , At Coty we are looking for ambitious Sales interns with a handson mentality As a Sales intern you are the right hand of the Key Account Manager and you participate in their daily work This internship is based at your homeoffice and our office in Schiphol, World Trade Center, , , , Coty is one of the largest beauty companies in the world Coty is the global leader in fragrances and is number 3 in color cosmetics Coty has a unique portfolio of fantastic beauty brands that makes it possible to celebrate and liberate the diversity of beauty, , Coty is subdivided into two divisions Consumer Beauty and Luxury Consumer Beauty is focused on color cosmetics, retail hair care and styling products, body care and mass scents in the mass retail channel Its iconic brand portfolio includes significant key brands like Rimmel London, Bourjois, NYC, Max Factor, Sally Hansen and includes Mass Fragrances and many others The Consumer Beauty portfolio is in full development, ensuring Beauty never stands still The Luxury division wants to strengthen its position in the luxury fragrance and skincare perfumery market Key brands within Luxury are the skincare brands Lancaster and philosophy, and our luxury fragrance brands include Hugo Boss, Gucci, Chlo, Marc Jacobs, Tiffany  Co, Bottega Veneta, Calvin Klein, Jil Sander, JOOP, Lacoste, Escada  Davidoff, , , , , , , , This internship is fulltime 38 hours per week, for a duration of 6 months and starts from MidJanuary1st February 2021 You will receive an internship allowance and travel allowance, if you do not have a student public transport card The internship can be combined with a thesis Be aware that this will largely have to be done in your own time, , , If you are excited to work at an international and dynamic company like Coty, send your resume and motivation letter today stating Sales Internship to internrecruitmentBNLcotyinccom Please specify the division that has your preference Well get back to you as soon as possible

WIE JE BENT, IKEA Barendrecht biedt een interessante plek voor een aankomend Teammanager sales die samen met het sales team wil bijdragen aan het verwezenlijken van de sales en store doelen, nu en in de toekomst Je bent zeer sales gedreven en bezit sterke commercile vaardigheden, je stapt op de klant af en geniet van het klantencontact Jij bent er klaar voor om binnen afzienbare tijd de stap naar Teammanager te maken Reageer dan nu op deze baan, , Naast dat je jezelf herkent in onze waarden, een passie hebt voor woninginrichting en staat te trappelen om jezelf en IKEA verder te ontwikkelen, voldoe je aan de volgende voorwaarden,  Je hebt een relevante hboopleiding afgerond,  Je bent gedreven om te blijven leren en jezelf en de organisatie te ontwikkelen,  Je hebt de ambitie om te groeien in een teammanagers functie,  Je hebt lef, ondernemerschap n durft commercieel out of the box te denken,  Je bent flexibel je werktijden zijn tussen 0800 en 2130 uur, ook in het weekend, , , Bij binnenkomst ga je naar de werkvloer om te kijken hoe deze erbij staat Wat niet netjes is, maak je snel even op orde Dit doe je samen met je collegas zodat jullie klaar zijn voor de klant De eerste klant die je ziet, benader je en vraagt vriendelijk waarmee je ze kan helpen De klanten adviseer en begeleid je in hun aankoopproces met als doel de klantbeleving dag in en dag uit te overtreffen Ondertussen stimuleer en coach je jouw collegas om hetzelfde te doen Later in de ochtend bespreek je een door jouw bedacht verbetervoorstel met jouw leidinggevende Je hebt iets bedacht waardoor klanten veel beter inzien waarom onze producten sustainable verantwoord zijn Direct daarna maak je je collegas ook enthousiast en start je op de werkvloer met je actieplan Hierna heb je een afspraak met een collega van de afdeling Communicatie en Interieur om een kleine verbouwing door te spreken Na dit gesprek ga je nog snel even naar de afdeling, om te kijken of je collegas nog hulp hebben en of het goed gaat met het uitwerken van het actieplan Aan het einde van de dag heb je namelijk een overleg met alle leidinggevenden Sales waarin je de eerste bevindingen wilt delen In dit overleg worden verder ook een aantal urgente zaken bespreken, , , Wij zijn wereldleider op het gebied van woninginrichting en zijn trots op onze waarden en Zweedse cultuur Samen werken we elke dag aan onze visie om een beter dagelijks bestaan voor zoveel mogelijk mensen te creren Dit doen we door een uniek assortiment woninginrichtingsproducten aan te bieden die voor veel mensen betaalbaar zijn, , , , , , Als je in deze functie bij ons aan de slag gaat dan kan je oa het volgende van ons verwachten,  Interne digitale opleidingen en coaching die je helpen om door te kunnen groeien,  Een inspirerende en uitdagende omgeving met leuke collegas, , Ben je enthousiast geworden en zie jij jezelf in deze functie Fantastisch Upload je CV en geef in jouw motivatiebrief je motivatiebrief voeg je toe in het uploadveld onder Deel wat meer op de sollicitatiepagina in ieder geval antwoord op de volgende 4 vragen,  Welke leiderschapskwaliteiten dicht jij jezelf toe,  Welke IKEA waarden passen het best bij jou en waarom,  Op welke manier heb jij in het verleden commercile successen behaald,  Op welk gebied zou je jezelf verder willen ontwikkelen, , Een integriteitcontrole via het waarschuwingsregister van de Stichting Fraude Aanpak Detailhandel is onderdeel van de sollicitatieprocedure, , Wij kijken uit naar je sollicitatie

About Us, , With electric vehicles EVs expected to be nearly 30 of new vehicle sales by 2025 and more than 50 by 2040, electric mobility is becoming a reality ChargePoint is at the center of this revolution, powering one of the worlds leading EV charging networks and a comprehensive set of hardware, software and mobile solutions for nearly every charging need We bring together drivers, businesses, automakers, policymakers, utilities and other stakeholders to make emobility a global reality, , Since our founding in 2007, ChargePoint has focused solely on EV charging and established a business model thats been validated by more than a decade in business and thousands of customers As we near a public listing milestone that will broaden our market leadership and build on years of innovation, ChargePoint offers a onceinalifetime chance to build our allelectric future and dominate a trilliondollar market, , Join the team that is building the EV charging industry and make your mark on how people and goods will get everywhere they need to go, in any context, for generations to come, , , , Manager Inside Sales, , , , Amsterdam, The Netherlands, , , , Without beginning there is no end At our Inside Sales department sales cycles are born, as well as sales careers We look forward to welcome our next Inside Sales Representative ISR focussing on Sweden at ChargePoint, , The ISR is responsible for direct inside sales to small and medium enterprises, and strategically developing sales opportunities for the ChargePoint Sales team within large enterprises The main focus will be to innovatively engage with prospective business buyers, to identify and qualify the lead through an educated variety of inbound and outbound approaches The position will require flexibility in working with the changing environment of a global sales force and the position holder will undertake other duties as assigned There is no travel expected for this role, , What we offer you, , What you will do, , , What you will bring, , Education, , Bachelors degree or equivalent desired, however, attitude and EQ always beats IQ and any degree

Job Description, , Who is looking for you, , Fixico is a fastgrowing car damage repair marketplace, backed by worldclass Silicon Valleybased investors, and scaling up rapidly throughout Europe Were looking for an ambitious and entrepreneurial spirit who will shape the growth and become the face of Fixico in the UK, , As Sales Director, you will have the unique opportunity to lead the business development effort and drive Fixicos business expansion in the English market while directly writing new chapters of this growth story In fact, youll be on the frontlines, responsible for attracting, negotiating and implementing commercial partnerships  overseeing the whole process, from initiating first conversations to closing deals and successfully launching live solutions, You will also develop the English commercial team Whilst doing this, you will work from the UK, but visit our HQ in Amsterdam on a regular basis eg bimonthly or quarterly, , In summary you have the ambition to bring our company to the next level on its way to become the number 1 digital marketplaceplatform for car repair in the UK and in Europe, , , , Our ideal candidate is an accomplished commercial executive with strong credibility and network in the English market, deep industry knowledge, and solid trackrecord in sales

Do what you love Love what you do, , At Workday, we help the worlds largest organizations adapt to whats next by bringing finance, HR, and planning into a single enterprise cloud We work hard, and were serious about what we do But we like to have fun, too We put people first, celebrate diversity, drive innovation, and do good in the communities where we live and work, , , , Workday is looking for an  Inside Sales Account Executive  to join our growing team, , This is a brand new role managing and growing longstanding relationships with our existing enterprise customers and executive sponsors, , Together with the fieldbased Account Teams, you will support complex sales cycles with the collaboration of other internal teams such as presales, marketing, value management etc, , You will assist in the renewals process of Workday customers, upsell with existing customers in an overlay capacity, support marketing activities and events, and collaborate with our strategic partners, , If successful, this role will prepare you for Field Sales or other exciting opportunities within the wider Workday Sales organization This position can be based in Dublin or Amsterdam, , If you can travel up to 20, here are the skills and experience youll need to qualify, , , As a part of the Workday application process, candidates applying to some roles may be asked to complete an assessment by pymetrics If the pymetrics assessment applies to the role you will be asked to do the assessment after submitting your application Workday reviews the pymetrics results as one factor alongside other candidate qualifications to help identify the best fit for Workday

Job Description: Responsibilities, , Your role, , You will answer to clients questions and requests on a daily basis supporting both sales and customer support teams, , , , , This VIE in Amsterdam is to begin as soon as possible but you need to plan 3 months between your application date and the beginning of your VIE assignment It will last 24 months, , The VIE is a specific contract, under Business Frances eligibility criteria, opened to candidates under 28 and from the member states of the European Economic Space Please see wwwciviwebcom, in order to have more details regarding your financial indemnities, , , , , , , , , , , , As soon as you arrive, you will be integrated into our teams and will learn every day alongside our experts, who will support you in your tasks Gradually, you will become more independent in your projects, making this experience a real career accelerator You will also discover all the diversity of our businesses, in a sector that is constantly evolving and innovating, , At the end of your VIE, various opportunities could be offered to you, in France and abroad, , At Societe Generale, we are convinced that people are drivers of change, and that the world of tomorrow will be shaped by all their initiatives, from the smallest to the most ambitious, , Whether youre joining us for a period of months, years or your entire career, together we can have a positive impact on the future Creating, daring, innovating and taking action are part of our DNA, , If you too want to be directly involved, grow in a stimulating and caring environment, feel useful on a daily basis and develop or strengthen your expertise, you will feel right at home with us, , , , You should know that our employees can dedicate several days per year to solidarity actions during their working hours, including sponsoring people struggling with their orientation or professional integration, participating in the financial education of young apprentices, and sharing their skills with charities There are many ways to get involved, , , , , , Socit Gnrale Global Banking  Investment Services SG GBIS is the investment banking arm of Socit Gnrale, one of the largest banking group in the Eurozone and a leading player in the European capital markets Combining innovation, quality of execution and local teams, SGCIB offers valueadded integrated financial solutions for its clients The Global Transaction Banking GTB business line is one of the major pillars of GBIS solutions, , The Payment and Cash Management activity, part of our GTB Division proposes solutions to treasurers of international and Dutch domestic companies and institutions, such as accounts, payment processing, cash pooling, electronic banking tools, foreign exchange, domestic guarantees, , You will part of the Sales team 5 people, in charge of developing the activity increase revenues and number of transactions processed The team members are Dutch and French and constantly interact with the Customer Support team 7 people

Company Description, , Eurofins Scientific is an international life sciences company which performs more than 400 million tests each year within its 800 laboratories across over 50 countries with more than 48000 staff expected 5 billion Euros revenue in 2020, , As a world leader in the provision of clinical diagnostics, forensic, pharmaceutical, food and environmental laboratory testing services, Eurofins has been able to draw on its scientific experience to develop a range of SARSCoV2 tests in response to the Coronavirus pandemic, , The Eurofins SAFERWORK programme is designed to help companies set up advanced risk management protocols and contributes to limiting the impact of COVID19 in the workplace Eurofins SAFERWORK program combines workplace surfaces and wastewater testing together with riskbased clinical testing, as well as relevant consultative, audit, and assurance services to assess and focus on areas where virus presence is likelier This approach reduces cost and supports health authorities to allocate capacity constrained human COVID19 testing where it is most needed, , , , Within its SaferWork division, Eurofins is looking for experienced sales executives to support the growth of our COVID19 customer base with governments, airports, sport leagues, etc, , The Sales Executive will develop and manage customers as well as ensure a planned approach to Customer Relationship Management in terms of identifying and strengthening revenue, relationship building and ensuring customer retention and customer visits The successful candidate will generate profitable new business and exceed new business targets in line with business plans, , , , , , , , , , , , , , , Additional Information

brand portfolio that includes TOMMY HILFIGER and TOMMY JEANS, , Tommy Hilfiger is one of the worlds most recognized premium designer lifestyle groups and is recognized for celebrating the essence of classic American cool style, featuring preppy with a twist designs, , Its focus is designing and marketing highquality mens tailored clothing and sportswear, womens collection apparel and sportswear, kidswear, denim collections, underwear including robes, sleepwear and loungewear, footwear and accessories Through select licensees, Tommy Hilfiger offers complementary lifestyle products such as eyewear, watches, fragrance, swimwear, socks, small leather goods, home goods and luggage, , , , The Ecommerce team is responsible for managing the European own and operated Tommycom sites across all European markets The team operates all necessary functions to manage the Ecommerce business endtoend Tommycom are growing in a fast pace and have very ambitious growth targets for the coming years The team consists of approx 80 people and will grow significantly until the end of the year Furthermore, team members are of various cultural backgrounds and nationalities, all highly motived and skilled as well as inspiring to work with As the own and operated Ecommerce business is one of the main growth opportunities, there is a high focus in the organization to support this growth One of the key pillars is to drive success through traffic and to become a data decision driven culture within the team Thus, we want to scale up our internal capabilities In addition, there are lots of projects running that supports performance initiative including data modelling, automation, enhancement of first party data, cloud base bidding, CMS development, , , Reporting in to the SEA Manager, The Tommy targets for the brand, together with herhis manager

Job Title: Account Executive I - Inside Sales, EMEA
Job Description: Description, , Ekata provides global identity verification via enterprisegrade APIs and a SaaS solution Our product suite is powered by Ekata Identity Engine, the first and only crossborder identity engine of its kind It uses complex machine learning algorithms across the five consumer attributes of email, phone, name, physical address, and IP to derive unique data links and features from billions of realtime transactions within our customer network and the globally sourced data of our graph Businesses around the world including Adidas, Checkoutcom, Klarna, and Amazon leverage our solutions to approve more good transactions, reduce friction, and find fraud, , As part of the team, youll be on point for evaluating a prospects needs, matching those needs to the right data solution and then going in for the close Dont worry, you dont need to have the entire sales playbook memorized  well teach you what you dont know, but wed like you to have some experience with sales, account management or complex customer service solutions so that you come out of the gate with a bang A technology mindset and a passion for data and how it can help businesses be more efficient in their interactions with their customers is a definite musthave in this role The B2B business to business DaSS data as a service technology space is the place to be if you want to grow your sales career and make some money at the same time, , , , , , , Unwavering in our pursuit of standardizing global identity data, we are approachable, real people that genuinely care about the success of those we partner with With a commitment to service, innovation, and ownership, Ekata is a dynamic place to work for folks who want to make an impact on a global scale We provide learning  development opportunities for each employee and promote worklife flexibility through selfmanaged time off Headquartered in downtown Seattle, Ekata is growing internationally with offices in Budapest, Amsterdam, and Singapore, , To learn more about the experience of working at Ekata, visit , , Ekata prides itself on celebrating diversity, inclusivity, and being an equalopportunity employer

Job Description: Heb jij minimaal n jaar ervaring met outbound bellen, Wil jij carrire maken binnen SaaS, Scoor jij graag afspraken met potentile klanten, , , , , , Onze opdrachtgever in Amsterdam is al ruim twintig jaar actief als pure SaaSspeler Zij zijn marktleider in het aanbieden en verzorgen van beveiligde cloud  En met ruim vijftig collegas zijn zij nog lang niet uitgegroeid Ze werken voornamelijk met  Vooral bedrijven in zijn erg tevreden met hun producten Ze hebben stevige groeiambities en zijn daarom continu op zoek naar uitbreiding, , , , En van de meest belangrijke rollen in het salesproces is weggelegd voor de Sales Development Representative Jij bent namelijk het eerste echte aanspreekpunt van een potentile klanten De manier waarop jij dit doet of dit bedrijf klant wordt of niet Je start door een lijst te maken met bedrijven die interesse zouden kunnen hebben in de propositie die jij aanbiedt, , Om erachter te komen of die propositie voor dit bedrijf echt van toegevoegde waarde is, zul je met deze bedrijven De uitdaging is om met de juiste persoon binnen de organisatie in contact te komen Zodra je die hebt gevonden leg je telefonisch contact en ga je op onderzoek uit om te zien in hoeverre zij bepaalde behoeften  uitdagingen hebben waarbij jouw propositie een oplossing kan bieden Zodra je merkt dat dit het geval is, boek je een afspraak in voor een demonstratie demo van het product Zodra de afspraak staat, zal jouw collega de AE account executive de demo gaan uitvoeren en hijzij moet ervoor zorgen dat de klant overgaat tot aanschaf Zodra dit het geval is, houd jij hier een mooie bonus aan over, , , , De rol als is een ideale rol om carrire te maken binnen SaaS Na een aantal jaar succesvol te zijn geweest in deze rol kun je doorgroeien naar BDR of zelf AE De meest succesvolle AEs zijn meestal mensen die zijn gestart als SDR Die basis die je in deze rol legt is dus van onschatbare waarde

Heb jij affiniteit met een gezonde en actieve levensstijl en ben jij op zoek naar een veelzijdige functie Dan is de functie van Assistant, Management Operations bij Herbalife iets voor jou, Wat breng je mee, , Als Assistant Management Operations heb jij een groot verantwoordelijkheidsgevoel Je bent de rechterhand van het MT en kan kritisch kijken naar processen Het is belangrijk dat de werkweek effectief gepland wordt, zodat er zoveel mogelijk uit een week gehaald kan worden Je moet niet alleen kritisch zijn, maar dit ook durven uit te spreken Het is hiervoor belangrijk dat je gestructureerd te werk gaat en een todo lijst af kan werken Je kan goed omgaan met ad hoc taken en weet te schakelen tussen de verschillende afdelingen Je hebt een proactieve houding, waardoor je altijd een stap verder denkt Naast dat je goed kan samen werken met alle collegas van Herbalife, kan je ook goed zelfstandig te werk gaan, , Daarnaast voldoe jij aan de volgende eisen, , , Wat ga je doen, , Ter versterking van het Management Team is Personato namens Herbalife Nutrition op zoek naar een Assistant Management Operations Je wordt de assistent van het MT, dat bestaat uit twee Senior Country Managers en de managers van de afdelingen Marketing  Sales, Events en Member Services Jij bent een spin in het web, kent alle collegas van de verschillende afdelingen en weet met wie je moet schakelen bij vraagstukken Binnen jouw takenpakket pak je administratieve taken van het MT op, help je de afdelingen met administratieve taken en projecten en heb je een facilitaire rol binnen Herbalife, , Je bent in jouw rol onder andere verantwoordelijk voor, , , Waar kom je te werken, , Herbalife Nutrition, opgericht in 1980, is een internationaal beursgenoteerde voedingsorganisatie Met hun unieke producten ondersteunt Herbalife haar klanten bij een gezonde en actieve leefstijl Door hun innovatieve producten zijn zij marktleider in de branche en hebben zij enkele bekende topsporters aan zich weten te binden Deze producten worden niet in winkels aangeboden, maar worden aangeboden via onafhankelijke distributeurs, , Wereldwijd zijn er meer dan 3 miljoen distributeurs In Nederland zit het hoofdkantoor gevestigd in Utrecht met ongeveer 30 medewerkers Vanuit deze locatie wordt de Nederlandse, Belgische en Maltese markt ondersteund, , In Venray is sinds 1998 het distributiecentrum About Taulia, , Taulia delivers working capital solutions that make it easy for businesses to free up cash, accelerate payments and improve supply chain health, , Since founding in 2009, weve envisioned a world where every business thrives by liberating cash Today, our team of financial gamechangers have built a network connecting 2 million businesses and processes more than 500 billion every year, , Through a unique combination of its technology platform, people and process, Taulia helps companies access the value tied up in their supply chain by transitioning from inefficient and often manual working capital management practices into technologyled, working capital optimization strategies, , Using our stateoftheart platform, businesses now have the option to choose when and how to pay and get paid It sounds simple But our painless process provides both buyers and suppliers the chance to skyrocket their cash  cash to fuel economic growth all over the world Its winwin for everybody, , , , For our Amsterdam office, we are seeking an entry level Inside Sales Account Executive responsible for driving and closing new business in our MidMarket business The successful candidate speaks Native German and business level French and will be goal oriented, willing to learn, and have demonstrated success in current and past endeavors The role is focused purely on new business and is suited to people who are sales hungry and those who can utilize their exceptional sales skills with effective and successful results, , The right individual will be an essential part of Taulias sales force, and must possess an ability to work creatively in a rapidly growing startup environment She will report directly to the Manager of Supplier Sales Europe, , , , , , , Part of what makes Taulia as successful as it is are the highly motivated people who work here and their enthusiasm for finance We recruit individuals whose honesty, integrity, initiative and creative approach to problem solving shines through An inspiration to your colleagues, you are tenacious, driven and highly motivated sales professional Hungry for success and with a committed motivation to getting things done, you always place the client at the center of everything you do, , , , Taulia is an Equal Opportunity Employer Minority  Women  Disability  Veteran  Gender Identity  Sexual Orientation  Age

Bedrijfsintroductie, Als onderdeel van het wereldwijde concern Swatch Group is The Swatch Group Netherlands de verkooporganisatie van gerenommeerde Zwitserse horlogemerken binnen Nederland Vanuit het hoofdkantoor in Eindhoven leveren wij aan zelfstandige juweliers en grootwinkelbedrijven Daarnaast heeft The Swatch Group Netherlands een groeiend aantal eigen verkooppunten, zoals de Swatch Stores, ShopinShops in de Bijenkorf en de Tourbillon Boutique in Amsterdam De Tourbillon Boutiques zijn een onderdeel van het wereldwijde concern Swatch Group Zij zijn de uitgelezen plek waar je alle prestigemerken van de Swatch Group onder n dak kan vinden, zowel voor de horloges als de sieraden Topmerken zoals Breguet, Blancpain, Glashtte Original, Jaquet Droz, Lon Hatot en Omega zijn binnen de Tourbillon Boutique te verkrijgen, , Als Sales Advisor bent u verantwoordelijk voor het gehele verkoopproces en adviseert u onze klanten bij hun keuze voor een horloge Als ambassadeur van onze merken bent u in staat om anderen te laten delen in uw enthousiasme U draagt samen met het team zorg voor de presentatie van de gehele Boutique en de collectie, zodat de uitstraling van de Boutique gewaarborgd blijft en deze er onberispelijk uitziet U bent tevens gedeeltelijk verantwoordelijk voor aftersales, denk hierbij aan uitleg en toelichting op reparaties Daarnaast neemt u deel aan salesmeetings en commercile events, , U heeft verkoopervaring opgedaan binnen de Retail in het segment van luxueuze consumptiegoederen U herkent uzelf in de volgende omschrijving

Accountmanager Bank, , Brand New Day Bank is een pensioenbank nieuwe stijl Het geld van onze klanten beleggen en sparen we voor de lange termijn Meestal voor een inkomen voor later, maar dat kunnen ook de bekende clichs zijn de boot of de wereldreis Dat beleggen doen we op een wetenschappelijke manier, want met serieus geld moet je niet spelen Saai No way De beleggingsmarkt is extreem groot en concurrerend Speerpunt in de strategie van bijna alle banken en verzekeraars En daar bemoeien wij ons ook lekker tegenaan Vrij en onverveerdWe zijn geen bankiers, maar ondernemers Daarin zijn we echt anders En dat merk je ook als je hier rondloopt We zien vooral kansen, weinig bedreigingen Rennen onszelf regelmatig voorbij Gaan ons geregeld te buiten aan jeugdige overmoed en bravoure En groeien daardoor exponentieel we zijn tien jaar oud, maar beheren dik  3,8 miljard voor meer dan 300000 klanten, , , , Als accountmanager binnen Brand New Day Bank ben jij verantwoordelijk voor de samenwerking met financieel adviseurs Jij gaat ons helpen de groei te verwezenlijken die wij voor ogen hebben Dit doe je door bestaande relaties met onze advieskantoren te versterken, uit te bouwen en nieuwe relaties te binden aan BNDJij beschikt over de gunfactor en legt daardoor makkelijk contact met onze stakeholders Dit doe je vooral van binnenuit, maar ook facetoface als dat nodig is Je werkt daarbij secuur en een proactieve en klantgerichte houding is een vereiste Dit werk doe je in nauwe samenwerking met collegas door prioriteiten te stellen en activiteiten op het gebied van marketing en sales te bedenken Alles met als doel om een betere partner te worden voor advieskantoren die actief zijn op het gebied van vermogensopbouw, , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , Altijd al willen werken bij een financial outlaw Reageer dan op deze vacature Vragen Bel dan gerust met Bianca Walraven 020  75 85 380, , Wil je meer weten over hoe Brand New Day met jouw persoonsgegevens omgaat Lees dan ons privacy statement

Sell what you love For us and millions of users across the globe, thats Spotify Join the Sales team and youll build the relationships that help grow our business in existing markets and beyond We dont just sell creative solutions to our clients and partners, we help to shape them using our expert knowledge of ad products, sales channels and the industry to impact the way the world experiences music and podcasts, , We are looking for a Director of Sales DOS, with an established record of sales leadership in the programmatic space, operational brilliance and revenue generation, as well as a deep interest and passion for online media, audio, innovation and automation Come join the band, , In this role, you will oversee our Ad Sales efforts in the Netherlands market We want someone who loves our product, knows the Dutch ad market, clients, agencies, programmatic buyers and demand partners, who can build creative, longterm consultative solutions and lead, motivate, operationalise and grow a sales team of Client Partners You should be confident without being arrogant, and hardworking while still knowing how to have fun, , , , , , , , You are welcome at Spotify for who you are, no matter where you come from, what you look like, or whats playing in your headphones Our platform is for everyone, and so is our workplace The more voices we have represented and amplified in our business, the more we will all thrive, contribute, and be forwardthinking So bring us your personal experience, your perspectives, and your background Its in our differences that we will find the power to keep revolutionizing the way the world listens, , Spotify transformed music listening forever when we launched in 2008 Our mission is to unlock the potential of human creativity by giving a million creative artists the opportunity to live off their art and billions of fans the chance to enjoy and be passionate about these creators Everything we do is driven by our love for music and podcasting Sales Internship, As a Kraft Heinz intern youll be the owner of your own projects, Kickstart your career with leadership exposure and a chance to prove yourself, , For 150 years, Kraft Heinz has products in a portfolio of more than 200 iconic brands, , We combine the rich heritage of the Kraft Foods Group and HJ Heinz Co with the dynamism and energy of a startup to bring transformative ideas and products to the table, , , , Account Management AH Internship, , , , Supporting key account managers in collecting and analyzing information on prices and promotions and providing input for account plans Providing customers with promotions of Kraft Heinz products, , Supporting key account managers in collecting and analyzing information regarding the Kraft Heinz products in the Foodservice industry Taking responsibility for promotional analyzes, shelf analyzes, and product analyzes as input for the account plans Creating and collaborating on category plans for one of Kraft Heinzs leading brands, Field Sales Foodservice Internship Location Amsterdam or Antwerp, , Supporting marketing activities, including organizing trade fairs such as the Horecava, Gastvrij Rotterdam, and other Trade Fairs Instore activation at the wholesale trade in cooperation with the Rayon Managers Take responsibility for starting, executing, and evaluating customeroriented projects for hotels, restaurants, hospitals, healthcare institutions, caterers, etc Supporting in the collection and analysis of information regarding customer segmentationclassificationreports Support Field Sales Coordinator and Field Sales Manager in daily activities Set up monthly presentations for Field Sales meetings Possibility to ride with Rayon Management to gain insight into the market Field Sales activation in collaboration with Sales and Marketing Making analyzes and reports of the commercial activities on the shop floor Provide input to the Field Sales Coordinator and Field Sales manager for internal meetings and presentations Maintaining and maintaining close contact with the store account managers, , Communication skills At Kraft Heinz, youll easily be exposed to senior management, no matter your level Therefore, it is important you have excellent written and verbal communication skills Confident and selfmotivated You have a strong confident work ethic and a sense of confidentiality and responsibility Curiosity, positivity  enthusiasm Youre curious, positive, and enthusiastic People know you as the driver of the team Ability to Simplify We like to keep it simple And to execute fast Your ability to simplify will be highly appreciated when you provide simple solutions dealing with complex challenges Team player Youre a team player, which means youre sometimes a leader, sometimes a follower but always working towards the same common goal together with your teammates Project management skills Time management has no secrets for you Youre organized, structured, and have a keen eye for attention to detail You have proven ability to handle multiple tasks in a fastpaced environment Ownership Skills Think and act like the owners of our business, make tough creatively, , , , Like any other company, Kraft Heinz has been affected by the regulations surrounding COVID19 Currently, the Amsterdam office is closed to all 500 employees to guarantee their safety from home environment

AkzoNobel has a passion for paint Were experts in the proud craft of making paints and coatings, setting the standard in color and protection since 1792 Our world class portfolio of brands  including Dulux, International, Sikkens and Interpon  is trusted by customers around the globe Headquartered in the Netherlands, we are active in over 150 countries and employ around 34,500 talented people who are passionate about delivering the highperformance products and services our customers expect, , , , AkzoNobels global success is supported by an extensive and outstanding HR organization Central to this is a sophisticated recruitment operation that identifies the talent that will help our company to achieve its business objectives, Within this context, your mission in this role is to provide endtoend recruitment activities with regard to roles for AkzoNobel in the Netherlands You will be based at Amsterdam in the Netherlands as part of a Local Center of Expertise LcoE dedicated to recruitment for the Netherlands, , Is this a challenge that matches your skill and ambitions Can you demonstrate experience of delivering successful, best practice endtoend recruitment campaigns within specified deadlines up to senior level Do you have experience of working with erecruitment ATS and social media platforms such as Linkedin Are you able to apply a conceptual, analytical and resultoriented approach along with strong influencing skills Above all, can you make a positive difference within our dynamic, multinational and multicultural business environment, , If you offer all this and more, we invite you to apply for the position of, , , , This is a highlevel recruitment role in which you personally manage the endtoend recruitment delivery of vacancies in the business, starting with the initial screening and the first interview of shortlisted candidates, , You also act as the custodian of specific targeted areas and proactively build talent pipelines through the use of erecruitment ATS and social media platforms such as Linkedin, , By collating information from other Talent Acquisition Partners you form a coherent big picture of labour market trends in the local market You are also responsible for collating and monitoring recruitment analytics including KPIs and SLAs to provide timely and accurate reports to the LCoE Talent acquisition Manager, along with recommendations for improvement, , At all times you promote AkzoNobels Employer Branding Proposition, , A further key task is to provides appropriate training and support to hiring managers, ensuring their ability to recruit in line with AkzoNobel processes, best practices and local law, , On an ongoing basis you proactively drive the efficiency of processes, and you assist the LCoE in rolling out global programs in the Netherlands, , As such, this is a role for a customer focused professional who can partner with business leaders whilst retaining the ability to ask challenging yet constructive questions, , , , , , We welcome your online application including a cover letter and resum, , Please note that applications via mail wont be taken into consideration Only online applications will be accepted, please go to wwwakzonobelnlcareers , reference 6856 or use the apply link For further information, please contact Ashna Badal, Country Talent Acquisition Lead, 31 088010 6789, option 2, , A preemployment screening may form part of the selection process, An online assessment may be part of the selection process, , Agency or sales calls are not appreciated, , All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, or disability, , Requisition ID 6856

Job Description: Okta is an identity company Identity matters because were all unique We were raised in different countries, cities, and towns We have unique backgrounds Weve faced specific challenges And weve learned a lot along the way At Okta we believe those experiences equip us to look at the world with our own perspective Our SaaS product protects your right to be you, and we want every single one of our employees to feel a sense of belonging, acceptance and comfort to express their ideas, because ultimately our differences are what makes us great And guess what You could join us because, , , , Oktas Benelux sales organisation are a team of highperforming, entrepreneurial and driven sales professionals and they are playing a key role in the global expansion of Okta as we establish ourselves as a market leader in the Benelux countries, leveraging Oktas existing customer references, marketing programs, partner base and ISV  alliance relationships After overachieving against their regional goals last year the team continues to expand and we are looking for an experienced Enterprise Sales Director in Amsterdam to help guide and mentor the Dutch team to further successes in 2021 and beyond, , We are looking for a strong sales leader to report into the Regional VP for Benelux  Nordics, to focus on managing and further building a highperforming sales team in the Netherlands This Leader will focus on coaching and developing the team to continue to succeed through skill development, adherence to activity standards, providing inspiration, and building a highly empowered, diverse, constructive sales culture, , The Enterprise team is focused on 2,000 employee user base accounts, , , , , , , Oktas Top 5 Core Leadership Competencies are part of the deeply ingrained principles that guide all of our companys actions They also align strongly to our cultural cornerstones, our Okta values love our customers, empower our people, never stop innovating, act with integrity, and maintain transparency Its our expectation that our managers and leaders embody these core competencies, , , , Okta is a progressive company that values you as an individual We are committed to career progression, employee wellbeing and making a positive impact in our local communities, , Okta is rethinking the traditional work environment, providing our employees with the flexibility to be their most creative and successful versions of themselves, no matter where they are located We enable a flexible approach to work, meaning for roles where it makes sense, you can work from the office, or from home, regardless of where you live Okta invests in the best technologies and provides flexible benefits and collaborative work environmentsexperiences, empowering employees to work productively in a setting that best and uniquely suits their needs Find your place at Okta httpswwwoktacomcompanycareers, , , , Okta is an Equal Opportunity Employer

Job Description, , Are you an experienced Executive Assistant looking for a challenging new role as Chief of Staff where you can make a real impact Can you prioritize like a pro and are you a star in project management Then definitely keep on reading this exciting vacancy and maybe you will join us in our quest to create a healthier and happier world, , , , As Chief of Staff you will be responsible for organizing, prioritizing and assisting in all the activities regarding the two cofoundersCEOs Your key focus as their right hand is to support them in setting priorities and managing these priorities in an efficient way For the weekly board meetings and monthly supervisory board meetings, your task is collecting and sharing all required documents and information with the internal and external stakeholders  all to make sure everything runs smoothly During these meetings you will share important insights and take notes, which will also be shared with all members, , As Chief of Staff your ideas and thoughts are highly valued, whether its in the weekly board meetings or any other project you are a part of Also regarding workflow optimization and automation, you will have the full responsibility to ensure the CEOs become more efficiently organized This includes driving and executing projects, workstreams and processes that will optimize day to day operations, such as implementing a new tool for calendar management, , As the right hand of both CEOs, you will also be responsible for managing their calendar and mailbox This includes scheduling meetings internally and externally But it doesnt end there This exciting role is as versatile as you want it to be, by taking part in company wide projects For example, you will organize the company wide Friday update presentation and the coordination of the office relocation project, , , , , , , , , We offer solid compensation, a monthly contribution to your gym membership, weekly crossfit and yoga classes when available again, knowledge exchange sessions pizza included and Dutchspeaking courses, , , , , We are Virtuagym a leading SaaS company providing an innovative allinone solution for health professionals ranging from large gyms to personal trainers This includes exercise, nutrition guidance, progress tracking, and online coaching, , We are with two offices in Amsterdam and Medellin 200 employees, nearly 15 million endusers, 30,000 trainers and more than 6,000 health clubs worldwide Virtuagym is a scaleup which grows 100 every year, , Team work, celebrating shared success and integrity are the most important values at Virtuagym and you will definitely have a chance to contribute to them Every one of your days with us will be an opportunity to cultivate and evolve your personal and professional skills, as well as to raise awareness and make a major impact on a global scale Here, at Virtuagym, we are not just colleagues, we are friends, willing to help, and support each other, so by joining us you become a part of an amiable and energetic team, , , , Please do not hesitate to apply, , For any questions on the vacancy, please get in touch with the recruitment team at, , Please note that we do not collaborate with third parties to fill this vacancy

Dan ben jij de kandidaat die wij zoeken om ons team te komen versterken, , , , , , Wij zijn TradeTrackercom, het toonaangevende internationale affiliate marketingnetwerk dat klanten helpt om gestelde online doelstellingen op basis van no cure, no pay te behalen, , Of het nu gaat om het kopen van kleding, lid worden van een datingsite, het boeken van een reis of het afsluiten van een verzekering, TradeTracker helpt de producten en diensten van duizenden adverteerders maximaal te promoten bij honderdduizenden publishers, , TradeTrackercom is wereldwijd en wij beheren campagnes voor vele internationale adverteerders zoals TUI, GStar, Helloprint, Alibaba en Desigual, maar ook lokale partijen als fonQ en Blokker Het succes van TradeTracker is gebouwd op de relaties van de account managers met duizenden webshops en honderdduizenden affiliates enerzijds en de betrouwbare, intutieve software anderzijds, , De vele features, Real Attribution en het diverse netwerk aan affiliates onderscheiden TradeTracker van de concurrentie De software maakt de resultaten van de campagnes tot in detail inzichtelijk dankzij toegankelijke rapportages en handige tooling Hierdoor hebben adverteerders en affiliates maximale controle over hun online marketingactiviteiten, , Wij zijn een bedrijf met een lean and mean cultuur snel handelen, vastberaden en een nononsense mentaliteit is kenmerkend voor de organisatie, , , , Als Sales Representative bij TradeTracker werk je samen in een team van gedreven, ambitieuze en enthousiaste collegas Zowel persoonlijk als in teamverband heb je de verantwoordelijkheid voor het aantrekken van new business en realiseren van doelstellingen Je benadert nieuwe klanten en behandelt binnenkomende aanvragen om ze aan te sluiten op ons steeds groter wordende netwerk, , Jij weet als geen ander hoe je TradeTracker op de kaart kan zetten en wekt interesse bij klanten door jouw sterke overtuigingskracht Je bent representatief, klant en servicegericht en weet wensen van prospects om te zetten naar passende oplossingen, , Een uitgebreide bootcamp en jouw gedreven collegas helpen je tijdens het trainingsprogramma om onze dienstverlening van top tot teen te leren kennen, eventuele vragen te beantwoorden en leren we je de kneepjes van het sales vak, , Daarnaast kan je goed samenwerken, ben je een waardevolle aanvulling voor ons team en haal je trots uit je werk door het behalen van succes Je bent leergierig en wil je graag ontpoppen tot een expert op het gebied van online marketing Daarbij beschik je over uitstekende onderhandelingsvaardigheden, ben je stressbestendig en is een negen tot vijf mentaliteit niet aan jou besteedt Heb je ambities om door te groeien tot manager of wil je de grenzen over in een internationale rol Het is allemaal mogelijk, , , , We starten op maandag 7 december met de eerstvolgende bootcamp Het is dus van belang dat je dan beschikbaar bent, , , , , , Herken jij jezelf in het bovenstaande profiel en lijkt het jou een geweldige uitdaging om voor TradeTracker te werken Stuur ons dan je en toe en wie weet tot snel

ook veel vrijheid Naast dat je onderdeel bent van een gedreven en ambitieus team, verwachten wij ook dat je het prettig vindt om proactief en zelfstandig te werken, Normaal gesproken werken wij als bouwen aan een nieuw team en bij te dragen aan de groei van Secretary Plus, Solliciteer dan direct via de sollicitatiebutton Heb je nog vragen Bel Katelyn Groen, bereikbaar op 0618201783, , , , Je dienstverlenend richting onze kandidaten en opdrachtgevers Je denkt in oplossingen en wil het beste voor de klant en kandidaat, , Heb jij, , , , , , Wij zijn al 30 jaar een specialist in de markt en kwaliteit is de rode draad in onze dienstverlening Hiermee leveren wij een actieve bijdrage aan het realiseren van de missie, visie en strategie bij prospects, accounts en kandidaten van Secretary Plus, Wij zijn een organisatie met gedreven collegas, met een winnaarsmentaliteit Secretary Plus hanteert vijf kernwaarden vertrouwen, ontwikkelen, focus, ondernemerschap en verbinden We werken hard en vieren successen met elkaar Persoonlijke groei en eigen verantwoordelijkheid staat centraal binnen onze organisatie

About FareHarbor, , Founded in Hawaii in 2013 and acquired by Bookingcom in 2018, FareHarbor creates powerful tools that help tour and activity operators run their business with ease and efficiency With thousands of clients and 500 employees worldwide, we have the fastest growing team in the business, and were shaping the future of travel, together, , , , Founding FareHarbor required unwavering passion Turning a startup into the worlds leading  largest reservation software for tours, activities,  attractions required relentless dedication and vision To date, weve helped over 15,000 global businesses operate successfully and are proud to have played a role in enabling business owners to live their dreams, , And since day one weve known that our real success lies in our peoplethe Ohana, , With each new feature launched and new client onboarded, there is a team of incredible people behind the scenes who are full of dedication, passion, energy, and the will to succeed We encourage everyone to bring their whole selves to workto believe in their abilities, to freely express their creativity, and to contribute with their own uniqueness by wearing their true colors We take care of one another and always prioritize health and wellbeing We give our people the space and trust to learn, to try, to succeed, to collaborate, to think outside of the box, to make mistakes, and even to fail And then we come together to try again, , From the minute you join, you have a voice You find your space You make an impact We celebrate our victories, shout our successes, and are always eager to tackle new challenges And we cant wait to see all thats to come, , , , Your goal as an Account Executive will be to reach out to potential clients and show them how FareHarbor can support them to Job Description: Develop your sales pitch, meet new customers and create better brand experiences  so you can take our beers further, , At AB InBev Challenge Accepted isnt just a phrase its a mindset Thats because we are the worlds largest brewer, with iconic brands like Bud, Stella Artois and Corona, , We are a team of curious individuals who see every challenge as a new opportunity to do something incredible We are resourceful people who thrive under pressure and take ownership of our success Because we are owners, we take results personally We dream big, take on new challenges and push the boundaries of whats possible, , Our sales teams are at the heart of our business connecting customers and consumers alike with a worldbeating portfolio of incredible brands Think you understand the world of sales Think again Whilst this programme will train, develop and challenge you in equal measure its just the first step in career with us Every career at AB InBev is unique but we can promise it will be fast, challenging and full of opportunity Are you ready to accept the challenge, , , , Our Market Visionaries Programme is a 18month programme in field sales, giving you the confidence, training and communication skills necessary to sell anything from new products to great ideas, , After an initial induction to the company strategy you will spend 18 months in the frontline of our business, either Ontrade sales pubs, bars, clubs or Offtrade sales supermarkets, corner shops, retailers Both require you to be out in the field, finding new customers, negotiating deals with business owners, and looking for ways to activate our brands and gain market share In addition, you will work crossfunctionally to develop your marketing and commercial skills We will make sure you are an expert in beer styles so you can use your knowledge to impress customers and ensure every beer served is a great one, , Its an intense programme thats designed to develop you to improve and innovate in a challenging environment Itll bring you up close and personal with a worldbeating collection of brands loved by consumers the world over It also offers amazing training from our senior leaders and is designed to help you lay the foundation to build the career you want If you deliver great results and meet our expectations, we will invite you to take your first managerial role within AB InBev, , , , Talented Hungry Ambitious Entrepreneurial You set trends rather than follow them You are innovative, creative, a doer as well as a dreamer, with a flair for communication and relationship building, , You are a natural salesperson  you love being at the frontline of the business, connecting with customers and merchants You will also have the confidence and resilience to back your own decisions, take ownership of your projects from day one, and meet ambitious targets, , You should graduate before September 2021 and no more than two years prior with a Bachelor, Masters or equivalent degree, hold a full driving licence and be fluent in English as well as the native language of the country you wish to work in to be eligible for this program You should also have no more than 2 years of professional experience internshipsvolunteersstudent jobs not included, , Please note you will need a valid visawork permit to be eligible for the program in the country you are applying for As part of the programme, you will be expected to be fully mobile, and you may be based in a different region in your country, , Please be advised thatu202fyou willu202fonlyu202fbe considered for the firstu202fapplication you submit, therefore pleaseu202fmake sure you are completely happy with your choice as this decision is final, , , , There is no need to upload a cover letter  this will not affect your application, , , , In this role, you will have the potential to transform our business and your career You will get the support and coaching you need to succeed We are a meritocracy, with plenty of room for growth and development, so you know your hard work will be rewarded We encourage you to dream big and go after your goals You will get to be creative, work with international teams so you can build a global network within AB InBev and have direct control over your career and where it takes you, , Whilst the Market Visionaries programme will give a worldclass foundation in sales, we dont believe in limiting the breadth of your career Previous MVP graduates can be found across our European business in areas from Finance to People HR Were willing to give you freedom to shape your career if you accept the challenge, , If this sounds like the incredible opportunity youve been waiting for, apply today, ,  , , August 2021, , , , httpseuropecareersabinbevcomprogrammesmarketvisionaries
