Regional Sales Manager EuropeBenelux, , Who is Ultivue, , Ultivue is a venturebacked company based in Cambridge, MA, developing reagentdriven solutions for highperformance biological imaging in tissue samples Our proprietary solutions enable translational and clinical research groups to realize the promise of personalized medicine through the deciphering of complex mechanisms of cancer onset and progression as well as the identification of biomarker signatures in tumor tissue samples to better match patients to therapeutic options Ultivue develops and commercializes products and services that seamlessly integrate into existing laboratory workflows to support biomarker discovery, assay validation, and potential companion diagnostic applications, , , , Ultivue is a growing start up, executing novel research and development, and already generating revenue with our commercial line of products Get in at the ground level and make an immediate and lasting impact on Ultivues mission In addition, take advantage of our industrycompetitive benefits package focused around three core objectives supporting health, financial security, and fun Our comprehensive benefits plan provides a wide range of options for everyones needs in addition to unlimited vacation At Ultivue the pace is fast, the people are passionate, and engagement is high If you would thrive by rolling up your sleeves while also being strategic and autonomous, where you will be rewarded for your efforts and productivity, then youll fit in beautifully here We love what we do, , , , Ultivue is looking for a highly motivated Sales Manager for Europe, ideally located in Benelux, to join our energetic Commercial team, reporting to of the Global VP of Sales The Sales Manager will organize the direct fieldbased promotion and sales of Ultivues Products and Services to specific academic, pharmaceutical and biotech accounts, , Assisted by a team of Field Application Scientists FAS, the Business Development Manager will develop and own key account relationships and ensure a high level of customer satisfaction within the assigned sectoraccounts primarily focused on the DACH Region with an option to include France, Italy or Spain depending on candidates experience This role is pivotal for delivering targeted, sustainable business growth in line with the companys ambitious strategic plan, , The Sales Manager has direct responsibility and accountability for all aspects of the sales account strategy and will work closely with other functions at Ultivue, impacting productservice delivery including Product Development, Finance and Operations This versatile role encompasses a wide range of fieldbased activities including attending relevant conferences, organizing highimpact seminars with business partners, and developing longterm business relationship with prospects and customers through regular inperson meetings The Sales Manager will promote the value proposition of Ultivues kit portfolio and partner with the FAS team to organize product demonstrations for individuals and groups of leadscustomers The Sales Manager will also promote Ultivues standard and custom service offerings to key accounts highvalue pharma and biotech organizations, nurturing these relationships to uncover longer term, strategic partnership opportunities such as CDx test development and more customized offerings

Job Description, , Your job, , As the Enterprise Customer Success Manager you will grow the footprint of Sana Commerce in the enterprise segment Your goal is to maximize our customers online success How By helping our largest customers to benefit even more from Sana This means leading and supporting them in their digital journey and rollout Sana Commerce across their international businesses and subsidiaries Identifying online opportunities and translating them into concrete advice You will advise our clients on getting the very most out of their web store and help them get the most out of our services Youre driven to guide your clients through their digital transformation and to achieve your ultimate goal optimize the commercial results for your accounts, minimize churn, and realizing upsell opportunities to meet business objectives of customers, , Being entrepreneurial is one of our core values Our core values guide us in our decision making and they define Sanas personality as an organization The team you will end up in is a great example of this core value You will become part of our global Enterprise team, which is in charge of all our enterprise customers across the world As this role is new to the company you will have the possibility to contribute to the setup and execution of a successful global strategy and have an impact from the beginning You will be directly reporting to the VP of Global Enterprise, who is responsible for the Global Enterprise team You will be working closely with your direct colleagues from the Enterprise team, but also with colleagues from our regional Customer Success, Marketing and Sales teams, , As an Enterprise Customer Success Manager at Sana Commerce, you will, , , , , , , You are getting excited by making customers happy and help them grow their online business You are entrepreneurial like to be part of a growing startup location and take advantage of the fact that you are part of a bigger, global tech company You are passionate about ecommerce for sure, , , , , , , It all started in 2007, with a pizza and a plan One evening in Rotterdam, the Netherlands, five people came together over a pizza and set out to create a B2B ecommerce platform unlike any other And Sana Commerce was born, , Sana Commerce is an ecommerce platform designed to help manufacturers, distributors and wholesalers succeed by fostering lasting relationships with customers who depend on them How By making our customers SAP or Microsoft Dynamics ERP and ecommerce work as one This unlocks total customer convenience, reliability without compromise, and constant evolution, , Sana Commerce is currently powered by more than 400 employees We all have our own expertise and specialties, from sales and marketing to project management and more But were all driven by the same goal to make our customers ecommerce projects a success, , , , So, what does being a part of the Sana team mean Below is a list of our core values  the most important beliefs we look for in new colleagues and the foundation of our company culture They guide us in our decision making and they define Sanas personality as an organization

At Rituals, we believe everything has the potential to become a ritual After all, what distinguishes a ritual from an everyday activity, largely amounts to how much attention we devote to the details The more attention, the higher the awareness factor, and the more ritualized an activity becomes A bit too zenny for you No problem, if you infuse your work with the dedicated attention that we devote to delighting customers, things will work out splendidly In your case, youll dedicate that attention towards making sure our main Distribution Centre is always fully stockedready to be send to all our customers around the world, , , , As Supply Planner you land in the centre of our innovative logistics operation Rituals Supply Planning  Inventory department has a refreshingly unique character, because we dont treat the supply chain as an afterthought Instead, we consider it the driver of sustainable success and inspiring customer experiences This means that well never let our supply chain be a bottleneck for growth, and that we are continuously investing in improvements Do you have exciting pilots in mind that the competition isnt ready for Experiments with new tooling Welcome aboard Its down to you to shape our supply planning for the future lift it to the next level and the one after that, , , , You will base our planning platform on Slim4 and assure 247 availability of your product range Clearly you will weigh all factors Such as seasonality, historic data, sales promotions and, last but not least, new product launches Is everything going as hoped and planned Do we have enough stock of promotional items Is everything selling You analyze KPIs and identify actionable insights which you, no surprise, act on resolutely, , , , Raymond Cloosterman, CEO Rituals, , We are a global brand, established in Amsterdam, The Netherlands, in 2000 Our ambition is to grow sustainably and become  and remain  the number one global luxury brand in cosmetics Today, Rituals operates in more than 730 stores, across 29 countries throughout Europe, Asia, the Middle East and North and South America with the aim to open 1000 stores by 2020, , By joining Rituals, youll get to experience a strong culture and entrepreneurial spirit which empowers you to create your meaningful career We care about the wellbeing of our staff, as much as we value the wellbeing of the planet By passionately looking after both, we believe we can pave the way to a more sustainable world and take appropriate action to limit our footprint on Mother Earth Youll have a strong sense of purpose at Rituals Our mission is to make people feel good and touch as many lives as possible Independent of your role, you will create a positive impact on our daily business, , , , If its you were looking for, please dont hesitate and send in your application Well be in touch soon, , YOUR BODY YOUR SOUL YOUR RITUALS

targets whilst working in close collaboration with our amazing crossfunctional partners, , As an experienced Commercial Sales leader, you will develop and execute a multifaceted Commercial sales and better understand their customers products are easy to use and implement They give organizations the flexibility to move quickly, focus on innovation, and scale with their growth, , More than 150,000 paid customer accounts in over 150 countries and territories use products Based in San Francisco, has operations in the United States, Europe, Asia, Australia, and South America, , Interested in knowing what we do in the community Check out the Zendesk Neighbor Foundation to learn more about how we engage with, and provide support to, our local communities, , Zendesk is an equal race, color, religion, national origin, age, sex, gender, gender identity, gender expression, sexual orientation, marital status, medical condition, ancestry, physical or mental disability, military About The Unit, , Yara Industrial Solutions is an autonomous business area that is dedicated to safe handling, production and sales of nitrogen chemicals These are mainly provided to the chemical, automotive, construction, healthcare, dairy, wood, pharmaceutical, steel, space and yeast industries Industrial Solutions is 100 Yara owned comprising Transport Reagents, Mining Applications, Industrial Nitrates, Base Chemicals, Marine Technologies and Production Our clients rely on a constant and timely supply for the smooth operation of their production process Yaras production scale and backup capability are key attributes in our offering ensuring reliability, scale and the ability to deliver in time, , Business Unit Base Chemicals provides the three basic nitrogen products  Ammonia, Nitric Acid and Urea  for a wide range of industrial applications, mainly in Europe and to some overseas markets including Brazil, Mexico and Colombia Our NChemicals are mainly used as a process agent for a variety of applications in the automotive, construction, healthcare, feed and food industries, as well as for environmental applications Our aspiration is to be the preferred NChemical partner, with safety, sustainability and reliable supply at the center of our customer centric approach, , , , , , , , , , Occasional short trips to EBS Vilnius as well as InternalExternal meetings with sales colleagues mainly in Northern Europe, , , , Untill 16112020, , , , For more information about the job content, please contact Arjan van der Have, HR Business Partner arjanvanderhaveyaracom or Bert Janssen bertjanssenyaracom Commercial Director North Europe BaseChemicals

Job Title: Business Development Specialist for Belgium, the Netherlands, and the UK
Job Description: The MA team is looking for an ambitious professional to further accelerate acquisitive growth in Netherlands, Belgium, UK  IrelandTo broaden our company portfolio, we are looking for a Business Development Specialist to identify prospects in the Netherlands, Belgium, UK  Ireland The Business Development Specialist represents the frontend of the acquisition process mapping and analyzing the Netherlands, Belgium, UK Ireland vertical software market, extending the pipeline of qualified MA leads, and getting in contact with prospects Activities will include both initiating contact via email, phone, or otherwise with potential targets as well as supporting target account management to ensure the market is sufficiently coveredThe Business Development Specialist is supportive of the broader MA team based in the Netherlands The person will be based in the Netherlands initially Still, there would be if required opportunities to migrate into the native region in the future to the extent desired by the candidateThe ideal candidate is representative and has excellent English and Dutch communication skills French is also an asset, has a fair degree of financial literacy can read balance sheets and understand revenue components and be comfortable conversing with experienced entrepreneurs and target company managing directors We seek someone who is entrepreneurial and proactive in their mindset, yet also methodological in their approachAbout Total Specific SolutionsTotal Specific Solutions TSS, founded in 2007, is an autonomously run operating group of Constellation Software Inc CSI and is active in Europe CSI acquired a majority of TSS in 2013 as the primary European platform within CSI TSS is the holding entity of a group of 70 business units BUs active in the field of vertical market software B2B, industryspecific software companies in Europe Our BUs operate as decentralized operating entities, each focusing on a specific niche market with a specific product offering MA is a strategic priority for TSS TSS, as an investment holding entity, is responsible for governance oversight and execution of the acquisition strategy In the past five years, our team has closed over forty international acquisitions resulting in a presence in 10 European countriesCSI is regarded as one of the worlds most active and bestperforming investors in the software space, having delivered 2025 CAGR of both revenue and cash flow growth over the past 25 years The majority of our growth comes from acquiring vertical market software companies around the world CSI is a public company based in Toronto, Canada, with more than 3 billion in revenues and a current market value of approximately 26 billion TSX CSUTO CSI acquires, manages, and builds vertical market software businesses located throughout the world  including Europe, North America, and Australia CSI has completed over 400 acquisitions of small, medium, and large private and public software companies since inception 3050 acquisitions per year globallyJob Description

Mendix is on a mission to enable anyone in any organization  from the marketing coordinator to the software developer to the CEO  to create things that are transformational for their company We are fundamentally reinventing the way applications are created and were reinventing the future of software development Sounds ambitious, right We agree, , Not to brag, but nearly 4,000 organizations worldwide, including KLM, Medtronic, Merck, and Philips, rely on Mendix to build web and mobile applications Thousands of our customers use our platform to delight their clients and empower their employees Its no surprise that were a recognized Leader by Gartner and Forrester in a redhot market expected to exceed 21 billion by 2022 Ok, maybe we did want to brag a little But were proud of what weve accomplishedandwere humble enough to admit that we need you to make us even more effective, , Were investing to accelerate our momentum and extend our market leadership and were looking to grow our Global Strategic alliances team If you constantly strive for excellence, are passionate about innovation, and want to work with a collaborative, energetic team  then Mendix is for you We value hard work, accountability, and results Above all else, we believe in a culture of growth, respect, and fun, , The ideal Strategic Alliance Manager candidate has a strong background in sales, business development, or partnership management They must also be technically inclined and naturally curious to learn about Mendixs portfolio, , The ideal candidate also understands deal structure and deal flow They have worked in, understand and can operate in a Matrix Organization Influencing without authority is key, they must be able to align crossfunctional resources within MendixSiemens as well as manage the same within the Strategic Alliance Partner they support They must also be comfortable working with senior executives both inside and outside their organization, , This role will require a mixture of sales, strategy, relationship building  enablement, and driving executive alignment Reporting to the Director of Strategic Alliances, the Strategic Alliance Manager will help navigate and network through their assigned Strategic Partner and significantly contribute to the execution of joint GTM plans to drive incremental revenue for Mendix They will also be closely involved with supporting their partner in sales cycles This is a high visibility global role with the potential for massive impact in a hypergrowth tech startup, , , , , , , , , , While we live on different continents, speak different languages, and work on different things, we are bound by our MendixBlue guiding principles Being MendixBlue means that you live the culture, and you consistently improve it as we grow Its kind of a big deal, ,  Without our customers, we have no business So, if you act in the best interest of our customers, alwaysyou belong here, ,  We work to have a meaningful, lasting impact on the world So, if you aim high and think long termyou belong here, ,  We want to be what happens next So, if you ask what if and work to find a way or make oneyou belong here, ,  We look, not just at the sum of what an individual has done, but at the potential of who they can be So, if youre up for learning from your failuresyou belong here, ,  Inflated egos dont last here, humility does So, if you share credit and ensure that the best ideas win  regardless of who they come fromyou belong here, ,  If something needs doing, we do it So, if you focus on the outcome, and take initiative to get it doneyou belong here, ,  We use laughter as a common language We can ask for help and were happy to give it So, if you find joy and purpose in what you doyou belong here, , , , There are precious few jobs that let you create the future But youll find one at Mendix We are at a pivotal time in our companys existence where rapid growth meets stable funding This is the time for industrious people to raise their hands to solve the next generation of problems Mendix is a place where ambitious people can thrive where you can identify an issue, propose a solution, and build the structure to make it happen, , Mendix is a Siemens business, which means were backed by the resources and stability of one of the worlds largest and most forwardlooking enterprises Think job security, , Since our company was founded in 2005, our aim has been to create a great work environment for people at all stages in their careers Thats why we are so pleased and honored that we were rated a top Cloud Computing Company to work for in 2019, based on feedback from our employees on Glassdoor With offices in the Netherlands, the UK, Germany, and the US, and more coming, we provide an international playground to truly impact the world through lowcode

Job Title: Stage / Internship Sales France at international startup in - Amsterdam
Job Description: Become responsible for expanding iLostfr in France, Internship Sales France, International StartUp Company, 3240 hrsweek Internship full time, , , , , , Where do you go when you look for information  right Internet Google everyone will say, , But where do you start looking when you lost something Everyone has its own method to search for a lost item, , iLost is changing that habit, , Companies, like hospitals, airlines and shopping malls take a membership on our software product iLost Whenever they find an item, they will post it through our software on the internet, , People that lost something, can search on our website for their item, find it, and even have it delivered back to their home addresses This process is all in our software of iLost, , Every large company has a lost and found section Our software helps the Lost and Found department to make their process easier the Lost and Found team can take a pictures of the item that they found, add a couple of key words, and within a few minutes the item is online Persons looking for an item, can search on our website for the item Once they find it, they need to answer a few control questions, before the item is granted to them, for example describe the color of the bag on the inside, , We are a B2B SaaS company, which means we sell a membership to companies for their Lost  Found department The companies pay a yearly fee, to be able to use our software, , Our database is growing very rapidly, and our mission to reach 1 million happy losers people that lost something, and then found it back on our website is getting closer, , Now we want to help companies in France Will you help us grow in France, , , , , , , , You will be responsible for expanding iLostfr in You will be working from our office in Amsterdam, the Netherlands unless national Covid19 restrictions inform otherwise You will be reaching out to large organisations that have a Lost  Found department, and you will ask them if they want to make their LostFound process more efficient by adding a software that will make the process smoother, , After the sale is made, you give online trainings to the Lost  Found team to make sure that everyone knows how the software works, , , , , , , , , , , , , , , Would you like to join us in the ambition to become the world leading Lost  Found software provider Apply on our website, Please communicate with us in English no worries, a typo in your English is OK, we all can get lost in a language that is not our native language

Do you like to be the first point of contact for Customers and do you have a good understanding of OrdertoCash processes Are fluent in English, written and verbal Are you service minded as well as commercial Do you want an independent role in a collaborative Customer Service team Welcome to LyondellBasell, , , , LyondellBasell NYSE LYB is one of the largest plastics, chemicals and refining companies in the world Driven by its employees around the globe, LyondellBasell produces materials and products that are key to advancing solutions to modern challenges like enhancing food safety through lightweight and flexible packaging, protecting the purity of water supplies through stronger and more versatile pipes, improving the safety, comfort and fuel efficiency of many of the cars and trucks on the road, and ensuring the safe and effective functionality in electronics and appliances LyondellBasell sells products into more than 100 countries and is the worlds largest producer of polypropylene compounds and the largest licensor of polyolefin technologies In 2020, LyondellBasell was named to Fortune Magazines list of the Worlds Most Admired Companies for the third consecutive year, , , , , , As a Customer Service Associate within the Distribution team you manage the accurate and timely execution of the order fulfillment process for a dedicated group of customers in Europe For this group of customers you are the main point of contact for all order related issues, you deliver high quality service by handling customer requests in a timely and professional manner This Sales  Planning stagiaire, dit is je uitdaging, , Nestle Purina is onderdeel van Nestle het grootste FMCG concern ter wereld Bij Nestl Purina weten wij als geen ander dat huisdieren ons helpen ontspannen en zorgen voor meer sociaal contact Als katten enof hondeneigenaar wil je dat je hond of kat gezond is en blijft Dit begint met de juiste voeding Bij Nestl Purina zetten wij ons daarom met veel passie in om baasjes te helpen de gezondheid van hun honden en katten te ondersteunen, , Wij zijn marktleider in de categorie Dierenvoeding in Nederland met vertrouwde merken zoals, , FELIX, GOURMET, PURINA ONE, BENEFUL, BONZO en PRO PLAN, welke overal te koop zijn van supermarkten tot dierenspeciaalzaken, van tuincentra tot dierenartsen en natuurlijk online, , In je stage krijg je de kans om alle aspecten van het account management en het bijbehorende planning aspect te ervaren Je zult leren hoe je onze verkopen analyseert en omzet in concrete verbeterpunten n hoe je deze vervolgens vertaalt naar een verbeterde planning in de toekomst Deze planning vertaalt zich door naar fysieke voorraad die we op elk moment kunnen leveren aan klanten Dus ook een stukje logistiek Ten slotte zal je uiteraard ook samenwerken met ons brede pakket aan klanten samen met het ervaren Salesteam, , , , Wij zoeken een sales  planning stagiaire per 1 februari 2021, dus ben jij genteresseerd in de FMCGsector, deze prachtige categorie en lijkt het je leuk het commercile en deels logistieke vak in de praktijk te ervaren Dan zijn wij op zoek naar jou, , Als Sales  planning stagiaire heb je de volgende verantwoordelijkheden, , , , , , Naast hard werken en veel leren, mag de sociale kant van een stage natuurlijk ook niet ontbreken Door de open en informele sfeer tussen collegas is er altijd ruimte voor gezelligheid Daarnaast bestaat er een hechte stagiaircommunity bij Nestl , , Een stage bij Nestl duurt 5 tot 6 maanden en start per 1 februari 2021 In principe loop je de stage op ons hoofdkantoor in Amstelveen, maar afhankelijk van COVID19 is het uiteraard mogelijk enkele tot alle dagen vanuit huis te werken We geven de voorkeur aan fulltime meewerkstagiairs, , , , , , , , , , , , Onze recruiters staan voor je klaar om je vragen te beantwoorden Stuur je vraag naar careersnlnestlecom en je krijgt binnen 3 dagen antwoord, , , , Zie jij jezelf in het profiel van een sales  planning stagiaire bij Purina Solliciteer dan nu via de apply nowbutton

Summary, , Keeping an Apple Store thriving requires a diverse set of leadership skills, and as a Manager, youre a master of them all In the stores fastpaced, dynamic environment, you exhibit composure as you learn from each new challenge You build and inspire highperforming teams of unique individuals who deliver positive experiences for customers as they learn, shop, and get support Most importantly, you share the Apple vision with employees and customers, , , , , Proven ability to drive amazing customer experiences  and results  through team development, , Experience with diplomatically managing multiple commitments to customers, staff, and operations, , Ability to adapt to challenges while remaining calm in a constantly changing retail environment, , , , , As a Manager, youre responsible for inspiring your team to create ownership opportunities for customers on the sales floor Elsewhere, you guide the talent that provides technical support and training, while working in partnership with the business team And behind the scenes, you oversee operations such as inventory and visual merchandising You actively build your teams  hiring, training, and developing team members in all these disciplines and more Supporting Apple simplicity is a complex job, and you make it look easy, , , , ,  You have demonstrated leadership ability with proven experience in a customerfacing sales setting, ,  Crossindustry experience is welcome, ,  You have a passion for learning about Apple technology and products, ,  You read, write and speak English fluently, ,  You are flexible with your schedule Your work hours will be based on business needs

founding CEOs of some of the greatest ecommerce businesses in recent history, our desire to shake up the footwear industry is off to a great start In fact, TIME already called our first shoe, the Wool Runners, the most comfortable in the world, and there is much more to come, , , , Weve sold a million shoes, launched three groundbreaking materials, and changed how people think about comfort, design, and retail Now were taking the Allbirds instore experience across the world and are looking for passionate retail ambassadors to execute on that mission, , , , The Retail Ambassadors core purpose is to deliver an exceptional customer experience through quality, personalized engagement Retail ambassadors contribute to Allbirdss culture by being teamoriented, accountable, and focused on continuous learning, , , , Delivering and executing on three primary focus areas Customer Experience, Daily Operations, and Teamwork, , , , , , Please apply with your resume and cover letter Were excited to hear from you, , , , Allbirds is an equal opportunity employer and makes employment decisions on the basis of merit Allbirds policy prohibits unlawful discrimination based on race, color, specialist is gestart, contact onderhouden met de opdrachtgever en de specialist, , Hierdoor bouw je je eigen netwerk binnen Brunel Je zult veelvuldig samenwerken met een recruiter bij het vinden van de juiste specialist Soms is er nood aan de man en zal je het niet erg vinden om mee te zoeken Voor deze rol is het belangrijk vloeiend Nederlands te kunnen spreken en schrijven Je hebt een afgeronde hboopleiding en beschikt over daadkracht, doorzettingsvermogen, inventiviteit en enthousiasme Daarnaast ben je veelzijdig en ga je graag de uitdaging aan Ben jij nieuwsgierig aangelegd, een professionele gesprekspartner en krijg jij energie om van een nee een ja te maken dan sluit deze job perfect aan op jouw drijfveren, , , , Wat zien we graag bij jou terug als ideale medewerker, , , , , , Heb je ideen of wilde plannen Laat ze horen, wij helpen je daarbij Daarnaast kent onze secundaire arbeidsvoorwaarden pakket de volgende zaken, , , , , Bij Brunel zetten we elke dag een stap extra, we zijn niet vies van een gezonde dosis ambitie Persoonlijke ontwikkeling wordt gestimuleerd, een speciaal toegespitst opleidingstraject en een breed scala aan cursussen wordt jou aangeboden Ben jij servicegericht en heb jij een sterke overtuigingskracht Heb jij affiniteit met digitale media n lijkt het je leuk om bij het grootste affiliate marketingnetwerk van Nederland te komen werken Dan ben jij de kandidaat die wij zoeken om ons team te komen versterken, , , , , , Wij zijn TradeTrackercom, het toonaangevende internationale affiliate marketingnetwerk dat klanten helpt om gestelde online doelstellingen op basis van no cure, no pay te behalen, , Of het nu gaat om het kopen van kleding, lid worden van een datingsite, het boeken van een reis of het afsluiten van een verzekering, TradeTracker helpt de producten en diensten van duizenden adverteerders maximaal te promoten bij honderdduizenden publishers, , TradeTrackercom is wereldwijd en wij beheren campagnes voor vele internationale adverteerders zoals TUI, GStar, Helloprint, Alibaba en Desigual, maar ook lokale partijen als fonQ en Blokker Het succes van TradeTracker is gebouwd op de relaties van de account managers met duizenden webshops en honderdduizenden affiliates enerzijds en de betrouwbare, intutieve software anderzijds, , De vele features, Real Attribution en het diverse netwerk aan affiliates onderscheiden TradeTracker van de concurrentie De software maakt de resultaten van de campagnes tot in detail inzichtelijk dankzij toegankelijke rapportages en handige tooling Hierdoor hebben adverteerders en affiliates maximale controle over hun online marketingactiviteiten, , Wij zijn een bedrijf met een lean and mean cultuur snel handelen, vastberaden en een nononsense mentaliteit is kenmerkend voor de organisatie, , , , Als Sales Representative bij TradeTracker werk je samen in een team van gedreven, ambitieuze en enthousiaste collegas Zowel persoonlijk als in teamverband heb je de verantwoordelijkheid voor het aantrekken van new business en realiseren van doelstellingen Je benadert nieuwe klanten en behandelt binnenkomende aanvragen om ze aan te sluiten op ons steeds groter wordende netwerk, , Jij weet als geen ander hoe je TradeTracker op de kaart kan zetten en wekt interesse bij klanten door jouw sterke overtuigingskracht Je bent representatief, klant en servicegericht en weet wensen van prospects om te zetten naar passende oplossingen, , Een uitgebreide bootcamp en jouw gedreven collegas helpen je tijdens het trainingsprogramma om onze dienstverlening van top tot teen te leren kennen, eventuele vragen te beantwoorden en leren we je de kneepjes van het sales vak, , Daarnaast kan je goed samenwerken, ben je een waardevolle aanvulling voor ons team en haal je trots uit je werk door het behalen van succes Je bent leergierig en wil je graag ontpoppen tot een expert op het gebied van online marketing Daarbij beschik je over uitstekende onderhandelingsvaardigheden, ben je stressbestendig en is een negen tot vijf mentaliteit niet aan jou besteedt Heb je ambities om door te groeien tot manager of wil je de grenzen over in een internationale rol Het is allemaal mogelijk, , , , We starten op maandag 7 december met de eerstvolgende bootcamp Het is dus van belang dat je dan beschikbaar bent, , , , , , Herken jij jezelf in het bovenstaande profiel en lijkt het jou een geweldige uitdaging om voor TradeTracker te werken Stuur ons dan je en toe en wie weet tot snel

Job Title: Account Manager/New Business Development - Consumer Goods
Job Description: Company Description, , Wish is a mobile ecommerce platform that flips traditional shopping on its head We connect hundreds of millions of people with the widest selection of delightful, surprising, andmost importantlyaffordable products delivered directly to their doors Each day on Wish, millions of customers in more than 160 countries around the world discover new products For our over 1 million merchant partners, anyone with a good idea and a mobile phone can instantly tap into a global market, , Were fueled by creating unique products and experiences that give people access to a new type of commerce, where all are welcome If youve been searching for a supportive environment to chase your curiosity and use data to investigate the questions that matter most to you, this is the place, , , , Your goal as the for fastmoving consumer goods at Wish is to develop our growing 1st and 3rd party business, using datadriven analysis to bring optimal supply that delivers results, through understanding our Wish platform and the needs of our customers, , A successful Account Manager will be able to effectively identify growth opportunities and work with external partners and internal stakeholders to remove barriers and find solutions to grow, , The ideal candidate is passionate about Wish and ecommerce growth at scale, has a strong innate curiosity, and the ability to thrive in a dynamic, fastpaced environment, , , , Youll be able to work remotely from anywhere in the Netherlands, , , , , , , Wish values diversity and is committed to creating an inclusive work environment We provide equal employment opportunity for all applicants and employees We do not discriminate based on any legallyprotected class or characteristic Employment decisions are made based on qualifications, merit, and business needs If you need assistance or accommodation due to a disability, please let your recruiter know For job positions in San Francisco, CA, and other locations where required, we will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records, , Individuals applying for positions at Wish, including California residents, can see our privacy policy
Job purpose, , Cover all types of activity to support the business generation together with External Sales

Position Description, We are Lenovo, Currently the number one PC vendor worldwide, we continue to be the fastest growing company in our respective field Were a leader in genuine innovation, dreaming up  and building  the technology and services that enable and inspire progress around the world, , We are dedicated to fostering an environment that encourages entrepreneurism and ownership  a workplace where your talents can be challenged, and your efforts recognized and rewarded Were the progressive thinkers, creative doers and endless tinkerers who will always challenge the traditional and who know true groundbreakers never stand still No matter what team youre a part of, joining us you can create real impact, , Do you enjoy a work culture and environment where you can see your career developing Are you excited to join one of the leaders in the IT world We are looking for an experienced Account Manager to join the Benelux team and take ownership of the overall sales of Lenovobranded Notebook, Desktop, AllInOne, Tablet and Monitor products within the assigned key retail partners in the Netherlands, , Your detailed responsibilities are, , , You will report to our Consumer Leader Benelux and will support retailers in the Netherlands The performance measurements are directly tied to key PL metrics of the assigned accounts This includes revenue, margin, average selling price and inhouse share, , Position Requirements, , , What Lenovo can offer you

Company Description, , Join the thousands of innovators, advocates and forces who are making an impact every day at one of the biggest footwear brands in the world Whether you love to connect with consumers on the retail floor or want to drive our awardwinning powerhouse in new directions, the SKECHERS team is the place to be Learn more about our brand at wwwskechersnl, , , , Our Sales Associates are responsible for ensuring our customer loves our stores and footwear as much as we do They each help deliver an incredible customer experience and showcase the Skechers Brand in all they do, , , , Greets, meets and gets to know our customer as much or as little as needed and makes sure they have a great experience each and every time, whether they stop in for 2 minutes or 2 hours Sells our incredible products, their features and benefits by recommending footwear and accessories that meet and exceed our customers wants and needs, , , , Treats our shoes and accessories with love, always making sure the floor is full, priced correctly, displayed to company standards, with the right signage and beautifully presented Refuses to accept anything less than a clean, pretty store Works urgently to process shipment or transfers within deadlines so our customers never miss that perfect pair Proudly serves as a brand ambassador for Skechers, sharing their extensive product knowledge every day, , , , Loves being part of the team and treats every coworker with respect, encouragement and team spirit Ensures this positive energy and enthusiasm is shared with every customer every day, , , , Recovers, fills, stocks, cleans and never stops moving to ensure our floor inventory and stores look topnotch Follows policy  procedure as well as best practices without exception to ensure a healthy, stable and profitable store When working the cash wrap, always demonstrates accuracy and integrity when conducting any customer transaction, , , , Something about retail speaks to you Like the host of a great party, you love welcoming customers every day and going above  beyond to ensure they leave happy You find standing around terribly boring, so you use your hustle to knockout your task list ahead of time, every time to make sure your store and sales floor is full, ready to shop and looks awardwinning As you work alongside your team and customers, you bring so much positive energy and fun but also never lose focus and always ensure your work is accurate and dependable Your previous retailcustomer service experience has taught you a lot, but you always want to learn more and welcome your leaders positive feedback and coaching, , Additional Information, , WHAT IS THE SECRET TO OUR SUCCESS OUR PEOPLE, , We thrive on fashion, design without limits and aim to succeed while having fun in the process, , Here at Skechers, we dont only believe in internal development, but we encourage it You can expect to grow with a company that believes in your talent and understands the importance of the investment for your future, , This is a unique chance to join a company with strong growth where you will receive a highly competitive remuneration salary, commissions, discounts and other benefits and professional career opportunities, , WELCOME TO YOUR FUTURE AT SKECHERS

customers cut across every major industry and include more than half of all Fortune 500 companies, , Today, Adaptavist leverages its deep technical understanding of Atlassian and innovative partnership with Slack to help organisations embrace new ways of working to achieve competitive advantage, , Through trusted consultancy, app development, training, hosting, and licensing solutions, Adaptavist has established itself as the goto partner of choice within the Atlassian Ecosystem, , , , The Strategic Sales Manager will play a key role in the Adaptavist Sales Process, and managing this endtoend This role will work with various teams across the business to define solutions for our clients, to guide the production of proposals which oversee our commercial approach and solution offering, as well as managing the client through the Adaptavist Sales Process The role of Strategic Sales Manager will engage with potential clients to understand their primary needs, drivers and identify appropriate Adaptavist resources, services and products to resolve them, , We are looking for a driven and passionate sales person who has experience in winning complex sales deals within consultancy You will thrive at building exceptional relationships with prospects as well as internal stakeholders You will have the ability to prioritise your pipeline so you are able to focus on the right opportunities at the right time Having the ability to forecast effectively is something you will be good at too, , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , Please check out our website to review our global benefits, , At Adaptavist, we are committed to promoting a diverse and inclusive community, and believe this positively impacts both the creation of our innovative products and our delivery of bespoke solutions to our global customers and our own unique culture We encourage all qualified applicants, regardless of age, disability, race, sexual orientation, religion or belief, sex, gender identity, pregnancy and maternity, marriage, and civil partnership status From our familyfriendly policies to our flexible work environment we offer a range of benefits and policies in order to support staff from all different backgrounds If you have any questions, please do ask us We look forward to your application

Too Good To Go is the worlds number 1 app for fighting food waste Why do we need to do that Because 13 of the food produced in the world is wasted And that has a huge impact on the health of our planet, 8 of greenhouse gas emissions come from food waste, , Our app has more than 278 million users across Europe, but were more than an app Our mission is to inspire and empower everyone to take action against food waste, so were doing all we can to create educational tools, make our knowledge as accessible as possible, find new business solutions and even change legislation to reduce food waste Were growing fast with 15 active countries currently and more to come and we are a certified B Corporation But heres what really matters through our app, weve saved more than 50 million meals from the bin  and its only the beginning, , Were proud of what weve achieved so far, but did we mention the issue is huge We are looking for a Head of Sales in the Netherlands to help us tackle the issue even faster and accelerate our growth, , , , We are looking for an experienced, dedicated and selfdriven Head of Sales with a passion for tackling food waste in a commercial way This is a great challenge for a hungry and driven sales leader who can grow, lead and nurture an enthusiastic sales team in a fastpaced environment without losing sight of our mission The role will be part of the Global Sales team where best practices and learnings will be shared across borders, youll become part of our tribe of 750 waste warriors around the globe, , , , You will divide your time between the operational challenges and strategic support of our sales team The team consists of 5 Key Account Managers and an Independent sales team with 10 Sales Specialists of which the Team Lead reports into the Head of Sales, , During the past year a good foundation and structure has been built to accelerate growth for Too Good To Go in the Netherlands  now its time to take it to the next level Engage our partners in new ways, building strong strategic relationships at senior level to grow our movement, as well as continuously improve the performance of the sales team, , As a member of the Management Team youll report to the Dutch Country Manager and will cocreate  execute the NL strategy, make sure the overall team temperature of the sales organization is consistently high thanks to the way you lead your team and inspire people to bring their best, , Your main goal will be to maximize sales performance, increase the number of food business on our platform, provide leadership to the sales team and develop structures and strategies to support the team as it grows, including, , , , , , , , , , We fight together food waste is a big beast to fight We can do it if we fight together as Waste Warriors with no ego We believe in a oneteam, , We raise the bar we always push for more We work smart, smash barriers and elevate one another, , We keep it simple our ambitions are bold but our solutions are simple, , We build a legacy were proud of the change were driving, , We care we always look out for each other Caring is also about the way we do business We do the right thing, , , , Do you want to be part of something huge and do you recognize yourself in the above Head of Sales description We look forward to hearing from you A case presentation is part of our recruitment process, , We take recruitment very seriously, so please carefully read everything we have written above including our requirements Please also check our website and international media in order to get a good overview of Too Good To Go We only accept applications coming through our platform no resume or cover letter will be accepted by email or Linkedin direct messaging

Junior Retail Activation Manager Luxe, , Wat ga je doen, , Als Jr Retail Activation Manager sta je midden in de organisatie Je werkt nauw samen met marketing en sales om de beste strategie voor de verschillende retailers te creren oa Douglas en Ici Paris XL Door outofthebox te denken en de marketing mix optimaal te benutten, zet je een krachtig activatieplan in de markt dat in lijn is met de commercile doelstellingen van LOral, , De Jr Retail Activation Manager is verantwoordelijk voor het creren van inspirerende en memorabele shopper journeys, om zo de consument voor lange termijn aan onze merken te binden Alle activiteiten moeten gemanaged worden binnen budget, met focus op ROI en in lijn met de luxe divisie strategie, , , , , , , vol met enthousiasme om het vakgebied marketing te vernieuwen en met jouw visie onze organisatie een stap verder te brengen, , , , Wij breken met de trend van vastomlijnde en generieke traineeships omdat wij geloven dat iedere carrire uniek is Daarom bieden wij een flexibel programma voor jouw ontwikkeling Dit bestaat uit een uitgebreid introductieprogramma en diverse soft en hardskill trainingen, afgestemd op jouw vakgebied De trainingen zijn zowel lokaal als op ons hoofdkantoor in Parijs door de huidige context zijn deze trainingen digitaal, waar je internationale peers zult ontmoeten waarmee je ervaringen deelt, , De ontwikkeling van talent staat centraal binnen onze organisatie Mede door dit persoonlijke ontwikkelplan wordt de groei van jou als professional sterk gestimuleerd, , A company is not about walls and machines, but about people, people, people, , Eugne Schueller, founder LOral, , , , Wij bieden een inspirerende werkomgeving met ambitieuze collegas, een gezond carrireperspectief met goede ontwikkel en doorgroeimogelijkheden zowel binnen als buiten je huidige vakgebied, zowel in Nederland als internationaal De vier verschillende divisies zorgen er daarnaast voor dat jij tevens in verschillende markten actief kunt zijn tijdens jouw carrire bij ons, , Uiteraard ontvang je een aantrekkelijk salaris en goede secundaire arbeidsvoorwaarden zoals een 13e maand, winstdeling, korting op ziektekosten en een gunstige pensioenregeling en korting op LOral producten Tot slot hebben we leuke extras zoals diverse sportieve bedrijfsactiviteiten, onze jaarlijkse Citizen Day en gezellige maandborrels, , , , , , Denk je dat jij klaar bent voor deze uitdaging en voldoe je aan de genoemde voorwaarden, , , , Bij LOral maken wij geen onderscheid in geslacht, etniciteit of leeftijd, , A diversified workforce in every function and on all levels strengthens our creativity and our understanding of consumers and it enables us to develop and market products that are relevant, , JeanPaul Agon, CEO van LOral, , , , Kijk dan op httpswwwlinkedincomcompanyloreallife, , LINLD

Job Title: Cloud Services Sales Executive - Public, Utility & Media sector
Job Description: Introduction, At IBM, work is more than a job  its a calling To build To design To code To consult To think along with clients and sell To make markets To invent To collaborate Not just to do something better, but to attempt things youve never thought possible To lead in this new era of technology and solve some of the worlds most challenging problems, , Your Role and Responsibilities, , IBM Global Technology Services is looking for technical sales people to join our team We are a group of salespeople with cloud subject matter expertise focused on helping IBM clients define and execute on their journey to cloud We recognise that the cloud strategy for most corporations includes a diverse multicloud environment and we want to help our clients leverage open source solutions to solve realworld challenges in moving, migrating, and managing cloud solutions, , In this role, you will support IBMs Journey To Cloud growth strategy by enabling our clients to plan and execute on their cloud platform, DevOps, and infrastructure strategies, Youll be responsible for building strategic relationships with executives and key business leaders to promote IBMs portfolio of cloud platform solutions, including hybrid cloud and cloudnative application development, and container management, , You will sell cloud solutions preferable Red Hat base in the Netherlands

At Rituals, we believe everything has the potential to become a ritual After all, what distinguishes a ritual from an everyday activity, largely amounts to how much attention we devote to the details The more attention, the higher the awareness factor, and the more ritualized an activity becomes A bit too zenny for you No problem, if you infuse your work with the dedicated attention that we devote to delighting customers, things will work out splendidly In your case, youll dedicate that attention towards making sure our main Distribution Centre is always fully stockedready to be send to all our customers around the world, , , , As Supply Planner you land in the centre of our innovative logistics operation Rituals Supply Planning  Inventory department has a refreshingly unique character, because we dont treat the supply chain as an afterthought Instead, we consider it the driver of sustainable success and inspiring customer experiences This means that well never let our supply chain be a bottleneck for growth, and that we are continuously investing in improvements Do you have exciting pilots in mind that the competition isnt ready for Experiments with new tooling Welcome aboard Its down to you to shape our supply planning for the future lift it to the next level and the one after that, , , , You will base our planning platform on Slim4 and assure 247 availability of your product range Clearly you will weigh all factors Such as seasonality, historic data, sales promotions and, last but not least, new product launches Is everything going as hoped and planned Do we have enough stock of promotional items Is everything selling You analyze KPIs and identify actionable insights which you, no surprise, act on resolutely, , , , Raymond Cloosterman, CEO Rituals, , We are a global brand, established in Amsterdam, The Netherlands, in 2000 Our ambition is to grow sustainably and become  and remain  the number one global luxury brand in cosmetics Today, Rituals operates in more than 730 stores, across 29 countries throughout Europe, Asia, the Middle East and North and South America with the aim to open 1000 stores by 2020, , By joining Rituals, youll get to experience a strong culture and entrepreneurial spirit which empowers you to create your meaningful career We care about the wellbeing of our staff, as much as we value the wellbeing of the planet By passionately looking after both, we believe we can pave the way to a more sustainable world and take appropriate action to limit our footprint on Mother Earth Youll have a strong sense of purpose at Rituals Our mission is to make people feel good and touch as many lives as possible Independent of your role, you will create a positive impact on our daily business, , , , If its you were looking for, please dont hesitate and send in your application Well be in touch soon, , YOUR BODY YOUR SOUL YOUR RITUALS

Job Title: Area Sales Manager | Panningen | Green People Recruitment
Job Description: Vacature van Green People Recruitment, locatie Panningen, , Functie omschrijving Area Sales Manager, , Als Area Sales Manager ben je verantwoordelijk voor het realiseren van de commercile doelstellingen die voor jouw marktgebied zijn vastgesteld Je maakt, plant, evalueert, reviseert en voert het salesplan voor jouw markt uit Voor het lopende jaar en voor de middellange termijn Je staat in voor de ontwikkeling van nieuwe markten en verkoopkanalen en bouwt sterke en winstgevende samenwerkingsverbanden op met als doel de omzet van onze opdrachtgever Fancom te verhogen, , , , Je rapporteert aan de Sales Manager, , , , , , , Onze opdrachtgever Fancom is marktleider in het helpen van pluimveeproducenten, varkensproducenten en champignontelers bij het verbeteren van hun processen in stallen en kweekruimtes Dankzij slimme klimaat, voer en biometrische systemen, sensoren en regelcomputers verbeteren ze de bedrijfsresultaten en de leefomstandigheden van het vee Het is hun missie om de wereld te laten zien dat de huidige technologie het nu al mogelijk maakt om op grote schaal duurzaam en diervriendelijk vlees te produceren Een uitdagende belofte in een interessante en innovatieve sector die nooit ophoudt zich te ontwikkelen, , Fancoms oplossingen zijn hightech stalautomatiseringssystemen, ontwikkeld met de modernste ontwikkelingstools en geproduceerd in een moderne productieomgeving Met een scherp oog voor de toekomst investeren ze voortdurend in de kennis van hun medewerkers Fancoms bedrijfscultuur is informeel en transparant Innovatie is hun tweede natuur, alleen dan kunnen ze de ontwikkelingen voor zijn, , Met meer dan 200 distributeurs, agenten en partners is Fancom wereldwijd aanwezig Ze zijn een dochteronderneming van CTB Inc, een toonaangevende wereldwijde ontwerper, fabrikant en marketeer van systemen en oplossingen voor het conserveren van graan het produceren van gevogelte, varkens en eieren het verwerken van gevogelte en voor diverse ruiter en industrile toepassingen, , , , Werken bij Fancom betekent werken in een uitdagende en afwisselende functie in een internationale, financieel sterke en ambitieuze organisatie die je volop mogelijkheden biedt om jezelf te ontwikkelen, verantwoordelijkheid te nemen en persoonlijk initiatief te tonen, , , , Voor meer informatie kun je contact opnemen met Jos van Kleef op 0654795926 Reageer direct via de link op onze website Uiteraard kun je ook jouw CV en motivatiebrief sturen naar via de button Solliciteer nu op deze pagina, , 5cd8a0b9cc68f9ffa4c9253553278a55

Changing the world of medical research starts with ensuring the world knows about us, which means having a healthy, scalable sales team We are looking for a Sales Operations Analyst to make sure our growing team can be as effective as possible, and youll have the perfect opportunity to make your mark with a fresh technology stack to work from , , Frank Cesaro, Head of Sales, , Who is Castor, , Castor is a leading cloudbased clinical data platform working with some of the worlds largest medical device companies, biopharmas, and renowned academic institutes We simplify the clinical trial process, from recruitment to analysis, with userfriendly, patientcentric technology Our mission is to bring medical research into the digital age Why Because medical research is still largely run using freetext, paper, and legacy technology Our selfservice platform enables our users to run remote, device enabled, patientcentric trials By helping our users capture highquality data and making it machinereadable, we are fundamentally changing the flawed evidencebased medicine process, , What youll do, , Joining as a Sales Operations Analyst, youll have the opportunity to support our global sales organizations growth, working with our New Yorkbased Head of Sales, Frank Cesaro How By increasing sales efficiency and developing new business processes Working with Sales, Customer Success, Marketing, and Finance, youll identify new sales strategies and look for unique ways to help improve long term growth by Optimizing our sales systems such as Salesforce, Salesloft, and ZoomInfo and training users Improving sales data quality to enable sales process improvements Building dashboards to track and report on key sales metrics Enabling the leadership team with the development and operation of a framework for quota and target setting, attainment, forecasting, and winloss analysis to improve sales velocity, , What youll bring, , Youll have a proactive, handson approach to provide insights into Castors overall business health Being a strong collaborator with topnotch multitasking, organizational, and project planning skills, youll ensure we continue successfully on our international journey, bringing clinical research into the 21st Century Youll also bring Expert knowledge in working with Salesforce Salescloud Experience with data analysis, leadchannel attribution, modeling, and reporting, , Analytical thinking skills and the ability to extract insights from data The ability to meet critical deadlines and work with urgency Experience working in fastgrowing or changing environments  in SaaS Even better, , What youll learn, , Its a crucial time for Castor Were on full power mode and scalingup at an exponential rate For you, the opportunities are endless To lead on sales data analysis for various projects across the business, , The ability to start with a fresh configuration and make your mark with countless improvements To develop sales policies and processes for an internationally growing business Be involved in maximizing the impact of medical research and improving healthcare, , What youll get, , At Castor, we truly live our core values, believing we can achieve anything with a healthy and happy team With this in mind, we offer the following benefits A flexible and remote working opportunity we also have some great NJ based offices A competitive salary plus a guaranteed happy holidays bonus Investing in our talent with a strong Employee Stock Option Plan 30 days of PTO including 8 national holidays and flexible sick days 401K with competitive employer contributions A great health benefit and insurance package Interested in lifelong learning Youll love using our development and training budget Flexible approach to working  nobody is tracking your time except you A new MacBook or Dell laptop, were a tech startup after all  Like to feel zen Youll love our company subscription to Calm for meditation and yoga

MAIN PURPOSE, , To further boost online wholesale performance An inviting role, because business is already booming, and we have the right propositions and tools in place to become even more successful in the digital domain Our groundwork includes a smart digital structure that strengthens every aspect of Rituals crossfunctional operations All we need to realise our online wholesale ambitions, is you That is, if you combine solid SEO and content creation skills with a lets achieve great content together attitude, , YOUR ROLE, , As Online Wholesale Sales  SEO Specialist you fulfil a highimpact position within Rituals Online Wholesale team You support Rituals teams at the head office and on location with bestinclass SEO strategies and content tactics to maximise organic traffic, , The environment makes this even more interesting we do not run a traditional webshop, but a multibrand ecosystem that our valued wholesale partners help create It is up to you to conceive and execute datadriven plans to boost the attractiveness, stickiness, and conversion rate of this platform And yes, all the usual SEO suspects are in scope Think visibility, onsite findability, and desirability You analyse the content and SEO value of brand storesproduct pages and recommend improvements and innovations that add value for Rituals customers and wholesale partners, and boost brand performance Once greenlighted, you implement those changes As for content creation you can fall back on the creativity of the Online Wholesale Specialist and our talented inhouse agency, but it is even better if you contribute relevant, engaging, and highconverting content yourself, , In order to maximise your impact as Online Wholesale Sales  SEO Specialist, you must also leverage partner tools and optimisation mechanisms A deep understanding of these tools and mechanisms will be your key to creating and implementing the winning 360 online growth plan Rituals envisions What sets the role apart, is that there is a second element to it SEO responsibilities aside, you will team up with and help key wholesale partners achieve their online growth potential Eg by sharing deep insights, by translating those into action plans, by aligning stakeholders, and by executing those plans SEO knowledge gets you far, but success in this role requires people and project management skills as well You need to closely cooperate with your counterparts at Rituals wholesale partners, ensuring we work toward shared goals, and constantly realign our plans After all, change is the name of the wholesale game In short, you support central and local teams to meet commercial online targets, in conjunction with wholesale partners and all other stakeholders that contribute to online marketing and growth initiatives, taking offline plans fully into account, , YOUR INGREDIENTS, , , WE ARE RITUALS, , Were not here to sell you beauty we are here to make you feel good Raymond Cloosterman, CEO Rituals, , We are a global brand, established in Amsterdam, The Netherlands, in 2000 Our ambition is to grow sustainably and become  and remain  the number one global luxury brand in cosmetics Today, Rituals operates in more than 730 stores, across 29 countries throughout Europe, Asia, the Middle East and North and South America with the aim to open 1000 stores by 2020, , By joining Rituals, youll get to experience a strong culture and entrepreneurial spirit which empowers you to create your meaningful career We care about the wellbeing of our staff, as much as we value the wellbeing of the planet By passionately looking after both, we believe we can pave the way to a more sustainable world and take appropriate action to limit our footprint on Mother Earth Youll have a strong sense of purpose at Rituals Our mission is to make people feel good and touch as many lives as possible Independent of your role, you will create a positive impact on our daily business, , BECOME PART OF THE RITUALS FAMILY, , If its you were looking for, please dont hesitate and send in your application Well be in touch soon, , Acquisition is not appreciated, , YOUR BODY YOUR SOUL YOUR RITUALS

ASICS was founded to lift the spirits of the world through sport Thats why were called ASICS Its an acronym from the Latin phrase Anima Sana In Corpore Sano or a Sound Mind in a Sound Body Right from the very start, our founder, Kihachiro Onitsuka saw that sport and movement had the power to lift spirits, project positivity and propel people and whole communities forward We still believe this Our goal is to support more people to experience the positive mental benefits that sport and movement brings And we believe every one of us can make a difference So, when you join ASICS, you join a team who is working together to bring about positive change through movement Together, we are moving minds

Job Description: Would you like to be our first Sales Manager Isolutions  Projects for the UKI and Benelux, Do you have experience with leading external international sales teams within a technical environment, Grundfos is looking for an inspring leader who can motivate and challenge a team, This position is directly reported to the Area Sales Director, Industry UKI and Benelux, Please take a look at the role criteria below and should you be interested hit apply, , The Job, , The main purpose of this job is to lead the external sales team towards delivering on the sales growth  profitability targets He or she is accountable for ensuring an effective collaboration between all functional areas on a local level ensuring that all drive towards the same aligned goals for the business, , Some other key accountabilities include, , , , Could this be you, The ideal candidate has a relevant business andor engineerging degree combined with at least 7  10 years of relevant experience from a larger international company working in a similar role, Along with this we would like you to have a proven track record in managing people An extra bonus would be if you have experience within OEM or have worked with larger EPC contractors, , Other role characteristics include, , , Why Grundfos, , At Grundfos, we dare to do things that others cannot or dare not do Our skills commit us to pioneer solutions to the worlds water and climate challenges and improve the quality of life for people We believe innovation is not only a business opportunity but an obligation And what really matters to us is not shortterm profit, but the impact we make By becoming part of our united powerful team, you too can drive this change no matter your role, , Furthermore, we offer you, , , , If you want to dig deeper into the Grundfos universe, please visit our Grundfos YouTube Channel herehttpwwwyoutubecomgrundfos or on Facebook

Job Description: Jordan Belfort aint got sht on you You close deals Thats what you do Youve been doing it for as long as you can remember And now its time to play in the big leagues, , Show me the money, , Dont worry Youll get to see plenty of money Whether itll be yours is really up to you Because you will make commission on every single euro, pound or dollar you bring in The currency may vary because thats what youll be selling Forex, , , , This company has been making waves in the international FX market for a few years now, from their offices in the UK and NorthAmerica Because of their continued growth and a changing global landscape, they are now looking to open a new office here in Amsterdam and theyre looking for the best closers in town to join them, , , , As one of the first members of the team, youll have the opportunity to build a business of your own Of course, youll initially be focused on business development but as you build out your network of decisionmakers, you will transition more and more to a mix of account management and business development And you wont have to go it alone You will have the support of a few very experienced portfolio managers who want nothing more than to see you succeed, , , , Itd be great if you already have experience in business development but all that really matters is potential Potential and your commitment to realizing that potential Its about output, not input So if youre not afraid to pick up the phone and start dialing, its time we talk This is your opportunity for greatness, , , , You mean besides an amazing salary, an excellent commission structure, and the chance to become an equity partner in the company Not much Just the opportunity of a lifetime So what are you waiting for Click Apply

betekent ook dat je elke dag iets nieuws leert Ben je op zoek naar een organisatie waar je impact kan maken en jouw inbreng cht gewaardeerd wordt Twijfel dan niet, solliciteer bij Watermelon en werk met ons samen aan het bouwen van Europas beste AI gedreven klanten service tool, , , , , , , , , , Hi, mijn naam is Jamal, , Ik ben jouw collega in het sales team Als SalesMelon bij Watermelon is het belangrijk dat je energie krijgt van Tech en dat je daar graag met mensen over in gesprek wilt gaan Het ene moment geef je een demo aan een corporate, en het andere moment ben je in gesprek via zoom met een startup, en praat je over de automatisering mogelijkheden, , Er is veel variatie, maar het belangrijkste is dat je niet bang bent om de telefoon op te pakken Het is belangrijk dat je sterk in je schoenen staat en dat je er echt in gelooft dat chatbots zakelijk Nederland enorm kan helpen Bij Watermelon krijg je vrijheid om jezelf te zijn, en zijn we constant bezig om ons zelf te ontwikkelen Je krijgt krijgt vrijheid maar ook verantwoordelijkheid Het is belangrijk dat je als SalesMelon je steentje bijdraagt, , Ik heb super goed contact met zowel mijn directe als indirecte collegas binnen Watermelon Het is echt een soort familie hoe Corny dat ook klinkt, , Ben jij de topper die wij zoeken Druk dan snel op de knop

At Rituals, we believe everything has the potential to become a ritual After all, what distinguishes a ritual from an everyday activity, largely amounts to how much attention we devote to the details The more attention, the higher the awareness factor, and the more ritualized an activity becomes A bit too zenny for you No problem, if you infuse your work with the dedicated attention that we devote to delighting customers, things will work out splendidly In your case, youll dedicate that attention towards making sure our main Distribution Centre is always fully stockedready to be send to all our customers around the world, , , , As Supply Planner you land in the centre of our innovative logistics operation Rituals Supply Planning  Inventory department has a refreshingly unique character, because we dont treat the supply chain as an afterthought Instead, we consider it the driver of sustainable success and inspiring customer experiences This means that well never let our supply chain be a bottleneck for growth, and that we are continuously investing in improvements Do you have exciting pilots in mind that the competition isnt ready for Experiments with new tooling Welcome aboard Its down to you to shape our supply planning for the future lift it to the next level and the one after that, , , , You will base our planning platform on Slim4 and assure 247 availability of your product range Clearly you will weigh all factors Such as seasonality, historic data, sales promotions and, last but not least, new product launches Is everything going as hoped and planned Do we have enough stock of promotional items Is everything selling You analyze KPIs and identify actionable insights which you, no surprise, act on resolutely, , , , Raymond Cloosterman, CEO Rituals, , We are a global brand, established in Amsterdam, The Netherlands, in 2000 Our ambition is to grow sustainably and become  and remain  the number one global luxury brand in cosmetics Today, Rituals operates in more than 730 stores, across 29 countries throughout Europe, Asia, the Middle East and North and South America with the aim to open 1000 stores by 2020, , By joining Rituals, youll get to experience a strong culture and entrepreneurial spirit which empowers you to create your meaningful career We care about the wellbeing of our staff, as much as we value the wellbeing of the planet By passionately looking after both, we believe we can pave the way to a more sustainable world and take appropriate action to limit our footprint on Mother Earth Youll have a strong sense of purpose at Rituals Our mission is to make people feel good and touch as many lives as possible Independent of your role, you will create a positive impact on our daily business, , , , If its you were looking for, please dont hesitate and send in your application Well be in touch soon, , YOUR BODY YOUR SOUL YOUR RITUALS

Auto req ID 221059BR, , Job Description, , What does the internship involve, , PepsiCo is looking for an analytic, independent and ambitious intern to support our retail sales team in the Netherlands for 6 months as of February 2021, , Within the retail sales department we are working daily on forging and strengthening collaborative partnerships with 3 different customer buying groups Albert Heijn, Jumbo and Superunie, which represent 15 retailers in the Netherlands For each buying group we have sales managers, account managers, account supports and commercial finance managers within the team Together with other departments such as category management, marketing, ecommerce, revenue management, logistics the team works on developing and executing customercentric sales plans on assortment, promotion and activation to grow our business, , As retail sales intern you will support the team in the development and rollout of our retail sales plans at all 3 buying groups A crucial part of your support is analyzing the customer data through SiS AH, 7even Jumbo and Nielsen all customers to track our performance and gain relevant insights on the impact of the initiatives we play Based on these insights we will review and adapt our plans accordingly Your customer data analysis input will be essential in the creation and tracking of the yearly customer plans Besides analyses, you will contribute to implementing tailor made activations both instore and on ecommerce, performing physical store checks to spot new innovations, trends  opportunities at our retailers, and supporting the team in multidisciplinary projects for which connecting with other departments is key, , All in all this internship is offering you a broad customer experience in the Dutch retailer landscape It also provides an international touch, as Albert Heijn and Jumbo have stores in Belgium as well, and these marketplace dynamics are very different from the Netherlands It will involve a wide set of tasks to develop your professional skills in a commercial company and can be your first step towards a career in sales, , , , At PepsiCo, we are not only proud of our market leading brands, but also attach great value to growth opportunities and personal development Next to working with inspirational and creative colleagues, we offer sufficient training opportunities to give our professionals the opportunity to achieve great results At PepsiCo we foster an informal working atmosphere and value everyones input and ideas No day is ever the same and you will constantly be challenged to bring out your best PepsiCo was rewarded this year once again with the Top Employer Nederland and Top Employer Europe certification, , In addition to your rewarding job function, we offer excellent working conditions that go hand in hand For example, you get remunerated for your role as an intern, get to take home goodies from the company every Friday and are given multiple chances to connect with the other interns 1015, to name a few, , , , PepsiCo products are enjoyed by consumers more than one billion times a day in more than 200 countries and territories around the world PepsiCo generated more than 67 billion in net revenue in 2019, driven by a complementary food and beverage portfolio that includes FritoLay, Gatorade, PepsiCola, Quaker and Tropicana PepsiCos product portfolio includes a wide range of enjoyable foods and beverages, including 23 brands that generate more than 1 billion each in estimated annual retail sales, , Guiding PepsiCo is our vision to Be the Global Leader in Convenient Foods and Beverages by Winning with Purpose Winning with Purpose reflects our ambition to win sustainably in the marketplace and embed purpose into all aspects of the business For more information, visit wwwpepsicocom, , , , Upload your CV and cover letter If your profile fits to the role and to PepsiCo, we will invite you for a video interview For questions regarding this internship vacancy, please contact Elena Wathelet ElenaWatheletpepsicocom, , , , , , , , , , , , Not Eligible for Relocation
