Job Title: Digital Retail Marketing Content Specialist, EMEA
Job Description: Who We Are, , Brooks is a team of passionate people united by a desire to do meaningful work, lead healthy lives and make a difference We share a focused mission to inspire everyone to run and be active Thats it No distractionsits all about the run Through science, creativity, service, authenticity and connection, we obsess over delivering the best running gear on the planet We do it our way, with our unique spirit, with a goal of being more relevant to runners than any other brand, day after day and mile after mile We are determined to innovate, challenging ourselves to lead thought at every turn Inside these walls and on the roads, tracks and trails, we live and breathe Run Happy, celebrating the positive impact running has on our lives and others We inject it into all we do because it makes everything better, smarter, more fun and more memorable Our company culture defines us, bonds us together and creates the conditions for success It is lived daily as a behavioral expression of our collective set of brand values Connect with People, Innovate for our Customer, Compete as a Team, Build Trust, Have Fun  Bring Passion, and Be Active If youre on our team, it means youre part of creating something extraordinary Youre part of Brooks, , , , Brooks is the leader in performance run at retail and has won by creating connections between the brand, the retailer and consumer As the runner becomes more and more digitally connected we see an opportunity to win with the runner and retailer by building this connection in the digital world through partnership with our retailers that pushes the boundaries beyond where we are now, , We are looking for an energetic and tech savvy Digital Content Specialist to support centralized production of bestinclass digital retail marketing tools for the EMEA region In this role, you will be responsible for managing the endtoend digital production process of our EMEA campaign initiatives with a digital and social focus You are a perfect complement to our team, if you combine creative mindset with digital and technical knowledge, and you have great communication and project management skills, , Reporting to the Retail Marketing Manager EMEA, this person will join a team of marketing and advertising specialists who use their unique skill sets to help Brooks grow their businesses in the digital retail age without neglecting the importance of brick  mortar retail While this role sits within the EMEA marketing team, crossfunctional collaboration with the EMEA ecommerce team, the local markets, external agencies and Brooks accounts will be critical, , , , Digital retail marketing, , , , , , , , , , By submitting this application, you expressly make the following representations and warranties and give your consents as described below, , Brooks Sports, Inc collects your personal data for the purposes of managing Brooks Sports, Incs recruitment related activities as well as for organizational planning purposes globally Consequently, Brooks Sports, Inc may use your personal data in relation to the evaluation and selection of applicants including for example setting up and conducting interviews and tests, evaluating and assessing the results thereto and as is otherwise needed in the recruitment processes including the final recruitment, , Brooks Sports, Inc does not disclose your personal data to unauthorized third parties However, as a global corporation consisting of multiple affiliated companies in various countries, Brooks Sports, Inc has international sites and Brooks Sports, Inc uses resources located throughout the world Brooks Sports, Inc may from time to time also use third parties to act on Brooks Sports, Incs behalf You agree to the fact that to the extent necessary your personal data may be transferred andor disclosed to any company within Brooks Sports, Inc group of companies as well as to third parties acting on Brooks Sports, Incs behalf, including also transfers to servers and databases outside the country where you provided Brooks Sports, Inc with your personal data Such transfers may include for example transfers andor disclosures outside the European Economic Area and in the United States of America, , At Brooks, we celebrate diversity  equity We are committed to creating an inclusive environment, and encourage people of all backgrounds, perspectives, experiences, and skills to apply Brooks is proud to be an equal employment opportunity employer All employment decisions are made without regard to race, religion, color, national origin, gender, gender identity, the presence of a sensory, physical or mental disability, medical condition, military status, marital status, pregnancy or child birth, sexual orientation, age, genetic information, status as a victim of domestic violence, sexual assault or stalking, political ideology, or any other nonmerit based factors

Job Title: Account Executive I - Inside Sales, EMEA
Job Description: Description, , Ekata provides global identity verification via enterprisegrade APIs and a SaaS solution Our product suite is powered by Ekata Identity Engine, the first and only crossborder identity engine of its kind It uses complex machine learning algorithms across the five consumer attributes of email, phone, name, physical address, and IP to derive unique data links and features from billions of realtime transactions within our customer network and the globally sourced data of our graph Businesses around the world including Adidas, Checkoutcom, Klarna, and Amazon leverage our solutions to approve more good transactions, reduce friction, and find fraud, , As part of the team, youll be on point for evaluating a prospects needs, matching those needs to the right data solution and then going in for the close Dont worry, you dont need to have the entire sales playbook memorized  well teach you what you dont know, but wed like you to have some experience with sales, account management or complex customer service solutions so that you come out of the gate with a bang A technology mindset and a passion for data and how it can help businesses be more efficient in their interactions with their customers is a definite musthave in this role The B2B business to business DaSS data as a service technology space is the place to be if you want to grow your sales career and make some money at the same time, , , , , , , Unwavering in our pursuit of standardizing global identity data, we are approachable, real people that genuinely care about the success of those we partner with With a commitment to service, innovation, and ownership, Ekata is a dynamic place to work for folks who want to make an impact on a global scale We provide learning  development opportunities for each employee and promote worklife flexibility through selfmanaged time off Headquartered in downtown Seattle, Ekata is growing internationally with offices in Budapest, Amsterdam, and Singapore, , To learn more about the experience of working at Ekata, visit , , Ekata prides itself on celebrating diversity, inclusivity, and being an equalopportunity employer

Laat jij de wensen van onze klanten uitkomen, Denk jij graag met onze klanten mee en heb jij een oog voor nieuwe business Onze business unit Managed Services heeft plek voor Sales Consultants die meehelpen in salestrajecten bij bedrijven die hun IT willen uitbesteden, Als Sales Consultant leg je de basis voor het succes van ons salesteam Je bent verantwoordelijk voor de ondersteuning van commercile activiteiten, maar ook voor het neerzetten en inrichten van onze oplossingen bij klanten Je analyseert de markt, kent jouw domein en geeft hierover presentaties en demonstraties Zie je commercile kansen Dan pak je die en weet ze succesvol om te zetten in resultaat, De vraagstukken waarmee jij aan de slag gaat, hebben betrekking op Applicatiemanagement, Cloud Computing, ondersteuning van eindgebruikers, de digitale werkplek en serviceintegratie of een combinatie daarvan Op basis van jouw kennis van infrastructuurprocessen en onze oplossingen weet je de unieke wensen van klanten te vertalen naar een duidelijk voorstel waar zij geen nee tegen kunnen zeggen, Je komt te werken op de afdeling Sales Consultancy Dit is een hecht team van Consultants die verantwoordelijk zijn voor het maken van offertes voor de set klanten die zij bedienen De brede scope maakt de functie zeer afwisselend en bij uitstek interessant voor Consultants die zich graag vastbijten in complexe ITprojecten Heb jij de skills om onze klanten te helpen, Een schrijfvaardigheidstest maakt onderdeel uit van de sollicitatieprocedure, , , , , , Organisaties die zich graag op hun core business richten, kunnen hun IT uitbesteden aan Centric De zorg voor zowel infrastructuur als beheer nemen wij ze dan uit handen, voor een deel of helemaal Met een slimme mix van public, private en onpremises diensten bieden we onze klanten gebruikersvriendelijke, veilige en toekomstbestendige IT Vaak gaat het om grote spelers in hun branche, met duizenden medewerkers Wij leveren alle services, support en techniek, zodat zij zich 100 procent kunnen bezighouden met waar zij goed in zijn
